boardgame.name: The Evolutionist
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The first Prestige Class for 5E from the Realm Scribe!

The Evolutionist uses arcane manipulation and inspiration from nature itself to alter the forms of the creatures of the world, but only through experimentation on a willing being; themselves. Whether it is becoming a flying monkey, an elephant with tentacles coming out of its back, or a crocodile that breathes lightning and can burrow through the earth, evolutionists specialize in becoming creatures with strange amalgams of traits.

This class is for high-level campaigns that allow for multi-classing in order for a character to meet the requirements for this Prestige Class. It is designed to fuse together the idea of a shapeshifting druid with an experimental wizard, and requires high intelligence and wisdom, levels in both the druid and wizard classes, and to be at least 10th level before taking a level in this class. Prestige Classes are very powerful and meant for high threat campaigns.

Included in this product are the rules for Prestige Classes (as imagined by the Realm Scribe), the class, and 5 new Beasts between CR 3 and CR 7.

boardgame.name: Nethzarr's Codex Vol. 1: Non-Fire Elemental Spells
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

25 new spells for 5E that expand the range of damaging spells beyond just fire and a few other key spells. Includes 5 new acid damage spells, 7 new cold damage spells, 7 new lightning damage spells, and 6 new thunder damage spells.

If you are looking to make a spellcasting character that isn't just another firebug, this product is perfect for you!

boardgame.name: Battletech: Experimental Technical Readout – RetroTech
boardgame.description: Experimental Technical Readout: RetroTech samples a number of new designs that have begun to emerge from secondary manufacturers across the war-torn Inner Sphere. Representing modern manufacturing with older techniques, most of the designs featured in this book incorporate a mix of modern technologies and older design standards--many rushed into service for their desperate consumers. Statistics and Record Sheets are included for 13 new experimental BattleMechs, vehicles, and aerospace units presented in this book, ready for play in advanced BattleTech games.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: Battletech: Experimental Technical Readout – Royal Fantasy
boardgame.description: Experimental Tech Readout: Royal Fantasy Tournament offers a complete list of the custom 'Mechs and battle armor devised for a special Solaris VII series of exhibition bouts with a familiar theme. Statistics, record sheets, and even pilot bios are included for 19 unique new experimental units, ready for play in (really) advanced BattleTech games set in the arenas of the Solaris VII Game World.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: Bumpy Ride at Bore IX
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

What was just supposed to be a simple iridium ore pickup is about to take a wild turn. Something at the mining outpost is turning people into lethal, mindless wretches. To make matters even worse, there is a traitorous psychopath among them.

Strap in, ‘cause you’re about to embark on a bumpy ride in the frozen wastes of Bore IX!

This is a pamphlet one-shot for Mothership RPG set on a remote frozen planet, perfect for a "simple" side gig for your crew.

Inside you'll find:

A snow buggy pointcrawl in a hostile mountain environment
A mining outpost with 10 colorful NPCs
A whodunnit mystery with a murderous psychopath
People turning into horrifying monsters

boardgame.name: Battletech: Experimental Technical Readout – Steiner
boardgame.description: Experimental Technical Readout: Steiner samples the custom and prototype designs that have begun to turn up in testing labs and top-secret proving grounds of the war-torn Lyran Alliance. Each design featured in this book incorporates some of the latest technologies developed by the realms of the Inner Sphere as the war against the Word of Blake winds toward its final conclusion. These technologies--first described in Tactical Operations --have yet to achieve widespread production, but each has been prototyped and rushed to the field for their desperate consumers. Statistics and Record Sheets are included for 13 new experimental BattleMechs, vehicles, aerospace units, and battle armor designs presented in this book, ready for play in advanced BattleTech games.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: LZ13
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

LZ13 is the unluckiest place on this god forsaken moon, totally screwed by the terraforming project. Only the Mining Operations keep this damn LZ staffed. And yet for whatever reason, you find yourself here. Escape the freezing cold, unnatural snowstorm and an alien hivemind.

LZ13 is a system agnostic scenario, recommended for sci-fi horror and investigative games.
In this A4 bifold you will find:


Keyed map of the landing zone
Three hooks of varying challenge
Hivemind monster made of ice
Frozen undead personnel
Snowstorms way too intense for a small moon

boardgame.name: Battletech: Experimental Technical Readout – Succession Wars
boardgame.description: Experimental Technical Readout: Succession Wars, Volume 1 samples some of the desperate technological experiments that the war-ravaged powers of the Inner Sphere tinkered with during the post-Star League Succession Wars period. Each design featured in this book demonstrates the combination of regressing post-Star League technology levels on the BattleMechs, combat vehicles, and aerospace units that followed. Statistics and Record Sheets are included for 14 BattleMechs, vehicles, aerospace units presented in this book, ready for play in advanced BattleTech games.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: Nomad
boardgame.description:
Nomad is a family game for more experienced players.
A nomadic tribe decides to move their camp to a remote but more suitable land. The chief hunter sets off to explore the unknown area and find the best route, and he will also acquire food for the tribe by hunting. However, the outcome of his actions will be largely determined by the prayers of the tribe’s shaman.

The game is played in 12 rounds. Players have their own terrain boards where they advance their hunter and move their camp (a yurt) towards the desired location in the farthest corner of the board. At the beginning of each round, the shamans offer sacrifices to the Goddess of Nature on the shaman hill. This will determine the order of players, and therefore the outcome of the next, preparation phase. Finally, players execute their actions: exploration by placing terrain tiles on the board, hunting, or moving their camp further.

When the game ends, players add up their scores received for the areas explored, the animals hunted and the distance they have reached with the camp. In addition, they can earn various bonuses for terrain tiles positioned in a smart way. Connected areas of the same terrain type on their board may also give multiple points, depending on size; some of these are easier, some more challenging to build. The player with the highest scores wins.

In Nomad, everyone builds the landscape for themselves, but this is by no means a solitary experience. Although there is a good deal of interaction during the first two phases, players make decisions on their own. This game is ideal for 2-4 players, playing time is about 1 hour.

—description from the publisher (translated)

A Nomad családi játék, gyakorlottabb játékosok számára.
Egy nomád törzs elhatározza, hogy átköltözteti a táborát egy távolabbi helyre. Az ismeretlen táj felfedezésére előre küldi a legjobb vadászát, aki megkeresi az optimális utat és élelmet is szerez. Akcióinak kimenetelét azonban nagyban befolyásolja, hogy mennyire eredményesen imádkozik a törzs sámánja a természet istennőjéhez.

A játék 12 fordulóból áll. Minden játékos a saját tereptábláján halad előre a vadásszal, és ott mozgatja a tábort jelképező jurtát a leendő táborhely felé a tábla átellenes sarkában. A forduló azzal kezdődik, hogy a sámándombon a törzsek sámánjai áldozatot mutatnak be az istennőnek. Ekkor alakul ki a játékosok sorrendje, mely meghatározza a következő, felkészülő fázis menetét. Majd ezt követik az akciók: a terep felfedezése tereplapkák lehelyezésével, vadászat, vagy a tábor mozgatása.

A játék végén a felfedezett területekért, az elejtett vadakért, valamint a táborral megtett távolságért pontokat kapnak a játékosok, sőt a tereplapkák ügyes illesztésével különféle bónuszokat is szerezhetnek. Sok pontot hozhatnak a táblán az összefüggő területek, amelyek közül némelyik könnyebb, másik jóval nehezebb módon építhető ki. Az győz, aki a legtöbb pontot szerzi.

A Nomad játékban ugyan mindenki magának építi a tájat, de ez korántsem jelent szoliter élményt. Az első két fázis során épp elegendő interakcióba keverednek a játékosok, azonban a saját táblájuk felett a döntést csak egyedül gyakorolják. A játék 2-4 játékos számára ideális szórakozás, egy játszma kb. 1 órán át tart.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Immune Inception
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A distress signal leads you to a decades old shuttle - The Immune Inception - lying stationary amid an asteroid field in a remote area of uninhabited space. There are signs of a recent struggle, and bodies float outside the ship. Bioscans show lifesigns still aboard, but are they friendly, a threat... or a lure?

Immune Inception is a one shot module for the Mothership SciFi Horror RPG which is formatted like a double sided tri-fold leaflet. It has been designed as either a random encounter or a hook for Tuesday Knight Games' Dead Planet, and contains everything you need to dive right in:


A fully playable, ready-to-run one shot to drop in to any sci-fi RPG campaign
Ship map, room descriptions, and crew profiles for the Immune Inception
Four original alien threats
Random tables for the infection of players and the infestation of ship systems
Player handouts showing ship schematics and still from external video feed

boardgame.name: Battletech: Dossiers – Lamenkov's Liability
boardgame.description: Lamenkov's Liability describes a lance of notable MechWarriors from the nascent Republic of the Sphere, highlighting their warriors, their machines, and their abilities both on and off the battlefields of the late 31st century. This Lance Pack dossier file provides players with the background and descriptions of all four members of the Liability lance and a micro-campaign based on their exploits, complete with character and BattleMech record sheets suitable for play with Total Warfare and A Time of War: The BattleTech Roleplaying Game.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat
BattleTech: A Time of War – The BattleTech RPG

boardgame.name: Arduin Calendar
boardgame.description:
From the Publisher:

Ever wonder how the cycle of years worked in Arduin? Wanted a tool to organize its 15 months and 453 days? Look no more! Herein is an organized layout of the months with each of its associated holidays, set to print in calendar fashion with space for notes and other GM needs.

Additionally, a second file is provided that displays the entire year at a glance for those times when you need a wider sight picture than a month.

boardgame.name: Battletech: Dossiers – Salazar Tsakalotos
boardgame.description: Salazar Tsakalotos is one of many warriors who have emerged from the fires of war to join the ranks of the notable elite, forging his reputation and his destiny with the aid of his custom Thunderbolt. This dossier file provides players with the background and description of one of the BattleTech universe's upcoming elite, complete with character and BattleMech record sheets suitable for play with Total Warfare and A Time of War: The BattleTech Roleplaying Game. Bring Salazar into the battles of Lamenkov's Liability (CAT#35LP001A) for an even more legendary performance, or simply employ him in your own games as a valued ally--or a deadly foe.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat
BattleTech: A Time of War – The BattleTech RPG

boardgame.name: Arduin Doomguard
boardgame.description:
From the Publisher:

One of the bogeymen of the Arduin mythos is revealed for you today! Doomguards are deadly adversaries: emotionless animated suits of metal whose unerring tracking ability cum teleportation makes them both implacable in their pursuit and inescapable!

Cross them to plumb the depths of what they guard if you dare!

boardgame.name: BattleTech: Dossiers – Youling Zhanshi
boardgame.description: BattleTech Dossiers: Youling Zhanshi describes a lance of notable MechWarriors from the Capellan Confederation, highlighting their warriors, their machines, and their abilities both on and off the battlefields of the late 31st century. This Lance Pack dossier file provides players with the background and descriptions of all four members of the Youling Zhanshi lance and a micro-campaign based on their exploits, complete with character and BattleMech record sheets suitable for play with Total Warfare and A Time of War: The BattleTech Role-Playing Game.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat
BattleTech: A Time of War – The BattleTech RPG

boardgame.name: Battletech: Dossiers – Jason Zaklan
boardgame.description: Jason Zaklan is one of many warriors who have emerged from the fires of war to join the ranks of the notable elite, forging his reputation and his destiny with the aid of his custom Ti Ts'ang. This dossier file provides players with the background and description of one of the BattleTech universe's upcoming elites, complete with character and BattleMech record sheets suitable for play with Total Warfare and A Time of War: The BattleTech Role-Playing Game. Bring Jason into the battles of the Youling Zhanshi (CAT# 35LP02A) for an even more legendary performance, or simply employ him in your own games as a valued ally--or a deadly foe.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat
BattleTech: A Time of War – The BattleTech RPG

boardgame.name: Battletech: Dossiers – The Bounty Hunter
boardgame.description: The Bounty Hunter Lance describes the notable MechWarriors who served alongside the Bounty Hunter during the early Jihad era, highlighting the abilities of these warriors and their machines, both on and off the battlefields of the 31st century. This Lance Pack dossier file provides players with the background and descriptions of all four members of the Hunter's lance and a micro-campaign based on their Jihad exploits, complete with character and BattleMech record sheets suitable for play with Total Warfare and A Time of War: The BattleTech Roleplaying Game.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat
BattleTech: A Time of War – The BattleTech RPG

boardgame.name: Battletech: Era Digest – Age of War
boardgame.description: Era Digest: Age of War is a mini-sourcebook that explores the pivotal developments of the Sphere-wide fighting that ultimately led to the birth of the Star League, featuring a glimpse of life in the BattleTech universe before the age of the BattleMech, the rise of neo-feudalism, and a look at the evolution of combat from the savagery of ˆ_Ñ??total warfareˆ? to the chivalry of MechWarriors. Complete with rules and stats for several Age of War units, Era Digest: Age of War also features role-playing support for this crucial setting in BattleTech history!
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: Battletech: Era Digest – Golden Century
boardgame.description: Era Digest: Golden Century is a mini-sourcebook that describes the development of the Clans at their origin in a new series format, giving players a glimpse of early Clan life, the basics of Clan rituals, and a look at the rise and fall of Clan Mongoose. Complete with rules and stats for several Golden Century units--including the first OmniMechs--Era Digest: Golden Century also features role-playing support for this crucial period in BattleTech history!
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: Battletech: Era Digest – Dark Age
boardgame.description: Era Digest: Dark Age is a mini-sourcebook that explores the pivotal developments in the immediate aftermath of the HPG Blackout, giving players a glimpse at early reactions to the crisis and the rise of the splinter factions fighting to take advantage of the chaos. Complete with rules and stats for several Dark Age units, Era Digest: Dark Age also features role-playing support for this crucial setting in BattleTech history!
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: Alcohol & Other Intoxicants
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

This supplement puts into d20/OGL game terms the effects of alcohol and a number of other intoxicants, to include cocaine, psychedelic mushrooms, opium, and pipeweed!

boardgame.name: ホシコレクト (Hoshi Collect)
boardgame.description:
A game in which you roll the dice on a tile card that resembles space, advance through the frame, and collect star shards.

The basic play is very simple, and is made for children to adults.

New tile cards will be replenished as you explore. In order to reach a high score, it is important to search efficiently and choose tiles with squares that will give you an advantage in searching.

Normally the game takes less than 30 minutes for four people, so it is very easy to play, and it is a game that you want to challenge many times aiming for a high score.







宇宙に見立てたタイルカードの上を、すごろくのようにサイコロを振ってコマを進めて探索し、星のかけらを集めていくゲームです。基本の遊びはとてもシンプルなので、子供から大人まで一緒に楽しむことが出来ます。
探索が進むと新たなタイルカードが補充されます。高得点を目指すためには効率よく探索を進めたり、探索を有利に進めるマスを含んだタイルを選び取ることが重要になるため、シンプルな遊びながらも多くの点数を稼いで友達に勝つためには、しっかり頭を使う必要があります。
慣れてくれば4人でも30分かからないため、とてもお手軽に遊ぶことができ、高得点を目指して何回もチャレンジしたくなるゲームです。

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Fais-toi une idée
boardgame.description: Fais-toi une idée is nothing like the classic puzzle game. Using a clue as well as a series of images, you have to make deductions and be creative to decode, with your team, as many puzzles as possible ... in 30 seconds flat.

boardgame.name: Escape Room: The Game – Family Edition: Escape Your House
Escape Your House: Spy Team
boardgame.description:
Work together, solve riddles, and find keys. Turn your home into an Escape Room with the help of your family or friends! This game is perfect for family game night or as a gift for kids.

The Super Secret Spy Team (SSST) is an organization that protects the world against dangers. One of the main characteristics of spies is that they go unnoticed. And what would be less noticeable than a sweet, innocent family or a bunch of keen friends? Which is exactly why the SSST is looking for people like you!

SOLVE THE PUZZLE:
Take on the challenge of the Super Secret Spy Team (SSST) in 6 thrilling missions. In each mission, you have 15 minutes to escape your house. Work together to solve the puzzles which have been left across the house, so you'll ultimately locate the key for the door lock. This game includes an easy-to-use door lock & timer, which counts down from 15 minutes right when you hit start. Simply place the door lock onto your front door or the door handle of any room you’re in, and it will lock into place. In an emergency, you can use the door key if you are not able to solve the mystery in time. Use the area arrangement card, so you know exactly how to turn your home into a top-secret mission. With all these supplies on hand and a variety of mission options and puzzle cards, you will have everything you need for a family game night full of adventures. Get ready for a wild ride of solving puzzles, finishing missions, and of course… escaping your house!

15 MINUTES TO ESCAPE:
Test not only your mind, but also your speed… because you only have a limited time. Finish one strategy game and wanting more? Simply move on to another mission.

6 THRILLING MISSIONS:
The Super Secret Spy Team is always needed for the world’s most high-profile missions. Choose from one of six missions to uncover the mystery and unlock the door.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Series: Escape Room – The Game (Identity Games International B.V.)

boardgame.name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood – The Promised Day
boardgame.description:
Commemorating the 20th anniversary of the phenomenal series, FULLMETAL ALCHEMIST, comes a board game based on the beloved anime FULLMETAL ALCHEMIST BROTHERHOOD.

In this cooperative board game, players take on the roles of some of the series’ most iconic characters, while working together to take down the creeping mannequin soldiers and dreadful homunculi and complete the Reverse Transmutation Circle. Take on the challenge solo or with a group of 2 to 4 players. The difficulty can be changed between Novice, Hard, and Ultimate – the last being a true test of strategy and skill.

“The Promised Day” in Central has arrived. Edward Elric, the Fullmetal Alchemist, and his allies aim to activate the Reverse Transmutation Circle to counter the homunculus’ Countrywide Transmutation circle. Do you have what it takes to stop Father’s ambitions?

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Microbrew: Sarsaparilla Promo Card
boardgame.description:
This promo card can be added to the thirsty customers deck. Doc Francis there loves Sarsparilla, which matches the “DMML” recipe in the base game -- the one with the scored out “perfect.”

He also will pay an extra $2 for any beer that is sweet. (He's offering the ORE-SOME style dollars, but we'll give him a 1 for 1 exchange rate because we're generous that way.)

Now mechanically speaking, Sarsparilla makes DMML slightly more valuable than it should be, so it’s not recommended in highly competitive play but it was just meant to be a fun little reference to our first game, ORE-SOME that we hope you enjoy.

—description from the publisher

Included with Kickstarter pledge rewards.

boardgame.name: Merchants Cove: Tantrum House Promo

Promotional rogue card made available through the Tantrum House Board Game Media: Season 8 Kickstarter campaign. And also through the Man Vs Meeple Season 4 Kickstarter Campaign.

boardgame.name: pedit5
boardgame.description:
pedit5, alternately called The Dungeon is a 1975 dungeon crawl video game developed for the PLATO system by Rusty Rutherford. It is considered to be the first example of a dungeon crawl game.

In the game, the player guides a character who wanders a single-level dungeon accumulating treasure and killing monsters. When a player encounters a monster, he can use one of several spells. Characters can be saved from one play session to the next. The dungeon was rendered using on-screen character graphics. Though the dungeon presents a fixed layout, the monster encounters and treasure were randomly generated, making it an early predecessor of the roguelike genre.

Source: Wikipedia, "Pedit5", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

Historical Context

While pedit5 appears to be the first dungeon crawl computer game, it was deleted just a few months after it was created. A second dungeon crawl game, m199h, was created in a lesson unit (i.e., space on a fixed drive) reserved for foreign language instruction. It was similarly deleted as soon as the illicit program was discovered. dnd, likely the third dungeon crawl game written for PLATO, had the most enduring success. It was the first PLATO lesson space created for the express purpose of being a dungeon game.

Later PLATO games, such as avatar, oubliette, baradur, moria, dndworld, bnd, and sorcery, were heavily influenced by dnd (and each other) while adding innovative features of their own, from 1976 to 1979. Dungeon games mentioned in this article can be played online through the Cyber1 system (a restoration of a mid-1980s vintage PLATO system).

Source: Wikipedia, "Dnd (video game)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

boardgame.name: Night Thieves
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Intelligence en route to a secret Thayan base is passing through the embassy in Mulmaster.

You have just two days to plan and execute a heist or lose your shot at the information forever.

Part Five of the Shadow Games series of adventures.

A four hour adventure for 5th through 10th level characcters.

Optimized for: APL 8
boardgame.rpgseries: DDAL - Dreams of the Red Wizards

boardgame.name: The City That Should Not Be
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Agents of the Red Wizards have come north in force and are excavating the buried city of Xorvintroth. You’re tasked with getting inside the city and finding a safe place from which the Harpers and their allies can spy on the Thayan operations.

Part One of the The Cold Dark series of adventures.

A four hour adventure for 11th through 16th level characters.

Optimized for: APL 13
boardgame.rpgseries: DDAL - Dreams of the Red Wizards

boardgame.name: The Amber Secret
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

You’ve revealed the mastermind behind the disappearances in River’s Shelter, and confrontation is imminent! But is the puppet master merely a puppet himself? If so, who is pulling the strings and to what end?

The fourth in the Ravenloft: Mist Hunters series of adventures.

An adventure for 4th-level characters.

boardgame.name: Mirror, Mirror...
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

A member of your party has been spotted causing trouble in Joquiet Village! The town now believes that you have become evil, but surely it couldn't have been you, could it?

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-WBW Dungeoncraft, The Wild Beyond the Witchlight

boardgame.name: Tatts
boardgame.description:
"Tatts" The Racecourse on the table is a simulated horse racing and gambling game from Australia published during the 1920's. Players consist of banker or " Bookmaker" and "Punters". The Punters place tokens or cash on the names of horses on the playing board. These horses are given "odds" to win. The Banker then gives a large pointer a spin which has the horses names on the board and when it comes to rest the pointer indicates the winner. The banker then pays the winner according to the odds marked on the board. Punters can back more than one horse or the top three winners.

From an Australian sporting perspective, Tatts has some historical interest. The horse names are Australian Champion Thoroughbreds from 1920 to 1921 with horse names synonymous in winning the richest races in Australia, such the Melbourne Cup, Sydney Cup, Caulfield Cup and Rosehill Guineas.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Rapture: New World Order Starter Box
boardgame.description:
That individuals with special abilities exist was discovered by Adam Weishaupt early on. He recognized the potential of his discovery and began to systematically track down the victims of witch hunts and provide them with a safe place to go into hiding. A secret society soon evolved from this undertaking, which Weishaupt called the "illuminati" and used to manipulate the balance of power in Europe to his advantage.
When the Templars became aware of him, however, he saw himself forced to find a new place of refuge in North America, which was still shaken by the Civil War. Due to the change in government and the general unrest, it was much easier for Weishaupt to set up the secret society there that covertly intervenes in world affairs. Through the foundation of the "Council of 13", the New World Order was born.

boardgame.name: Battletech: Field Report – AFFS
boardgame.description:
Field Report: AFFS describes the state of the Federated Suns in the wake of the events described in Jihad Hot Spots: Terra, including the overall military and logistical condition of one of the Great Houses who stood against the Word of Blake menace. Savaged by conflicts on virtually every border, the armies of House Davion remain now stand on the threshold of a new era, while struggling to recover from over a decade of unrelenting war...

Field Reports are detailed references for creating scenarios & adventures.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat
BattleTech: A Time of War – The BattleTech RPG

boardgame.name: Battletech: Field Report – The Clans
boardgame.description:
Field Report: Clans describes the state of the various Clan factions now based in the Inner Sphere following the events described in Jihad Hot Spots: Terra, including the overall military and logistical condition of the Clans that now claim many worlds and regions across of the war-ravaged Inner Sphere. Emerging from their own secret conflicts, battered by Word of Blake actions, and struggling to find their way in a hostile Sphere, far from their Homeworlds, these lost children of Kerensky now face a strange new era in the wake of one of mankind’s most savage wars…

Field Reports are detailed references for creating scenarios & adventures.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat
BattleTech: A Time of War – The BattleTech RPG

boardgame.name: Battletech: Field Report – CCAF
boardgame.description:
Field Report: CCAF describes the state of the Capellan Confederation in the wake of the events described in Jihad Hot Spots: Terra, including the overall military and logistical condition of one of the Great Houses who stood against the Word of Blake menace. Broken, but undefeated, the armies of House Liao remain a force to be reckoned with, as a new age dawns.

Field Reports are detailed references for creating scenarios & adventures.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat
BattleTech: A Time of War – The BattleTech RPG

boardgame.name: LEGO DC Super - Villains Justice League Dark
boardgame.description: Download now to get access to the Justice League Dark Character Pack! Expand your character roster with the Justice League Dark Character Pack.

boardgame.name: LEGO DC TV Series Super Heroes Character Pack
boardgame.description:
Download now to get access to the DC TV Super Heroes Character Pack! Expand your character roster with the DC TV Super Heroes Character Pack. Play as your favorite Super Heroes from DC’s exciting TV Series! This Character Pack includes:
• Black Lightning
• Supergirl
• Flash
• Atom
• Vibe
• Green Arrow

boardgame.name: Alles Augsburg...?: Das Quiz
boardgame.description:
In this trivia game, one question and 4 answers about Augsburg are read out in turn. At least one answer is correct and at least one answer is wrong. The other two answers can be wrong or right. All players now guess which answers are correct. Each player can place at least one, but no more than 3, guessing stones. If you guess an incorrect answer, you do not win any points. All other players receive one point for each correct answer. The player who has collected the most points after an agreed number of questions wins the game.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Crisis at Steamfall: Premium Card Holder
boardgame.description:
A card holder for the game.
This item was given to early bird backers and returning backers during the Genesis expansion kickstarter campaign or could be purchased as an add on.
The card holder can be assembled without the tall background to prevent sight obstruction in some situations.

boardgame.name: Manolo Chess
boardgame.description:
The game is played on a round playing field with 4 x 16 squares. Due to the arrangement of the playing fields, some pieces have greater freedom of movement (queen, rook), while others are more restricted (bishop). The center line of the circle is defined as the baseline.
Otherwise, the usual rules of chess apply.

—user summary

boardgame.name: LEGO DC TV Series Super-Villains Character Pack
boardgame.description:
Download now to get access to the DC TV Super-Villains Character Pack! Expand your character roster with the DC TV Super-Villains Character Pack. Play as your favorite Super-Villains from DC's exciting TV Series. This character pack includes:
• Vandal Savage
• Vigilante
• Zoom
• Reign
• Indigo
• Prometheus

boardgame.name: LEGO DC Super-Villains Aquaman Bundle Pack
boardgame.description: Download now to get access to the Aquaman Movie Level Pack 1 & 2! Control your favorite characters based on the DC Aquaman film! Battle as Aquaman and rule the underwater kingdom of Atlantis! Level Packs include Aquaman, Black Manta, Mera, Orm and more.

boardgame.name: Herbarium
ハーバリウム
boardgame.description:
Herbarium is a board game designed for you to become a herbarium designer and create the most beautiful bottles! A herbarium is an ornamental item made by stuffing dried flowers in small bottles and soaked in special oils.

In this game, you'll combine 8-color flower chips to create a role and compete for a highest score. The purchasing phase and the fair phase will be repeated, and the first player to win two gold medals in the Fair Phase will win.

The bottle contains up to three materials, and the combination of the three colors can be used in various roles. In addition, let's aim for a high score by making good use of the "trendy color" of the season and "push color" that only the judges know.

If you only care about your work, other players will have an advantage, so purchase while looking at the situation of the players around you.


『Herbarium』はハーバリウムデザイナーとなって、誰よりも美しい作品を作ることを目的とした、思考と視覚で楽しむボードゲームです。ハーバリウムとはドライフラワーなどを小瓶に詰め、専用のオイルに漬けた観賞用のアイテムです。
このゲームでは８色の花のチップを組み合わせて役を作り、より高得点を競います。
仕入れフェイズと品評会フェイズを繰り返し進行していき、品評会フェイズで最初に金賞を２回受賞したプレイヤーの勝利となります。

瓶には最大３つの素材が入り、その３つの色の組み合わせによって様々な役が成立します。
また、そのシーズンの「流行色」や審査員しか知らない「推し色」などを上手に利用して高得点を狙いましょう。
自分の作品ばかり気にしていると、他のプレイヤーが有利になってしまうので周りのプレイヤーの状況をうかがいながら仕入れましょう。

最初に金賞を２回受賞したプレイヤーの勝利となります。

boardgame.name: LEGO DC Super-Villains DC Movies Character Pack
boardgame.description:
Download now to get access to the DC Movies Character Pack! Expand your character roster with the DC Movies Character Pack. Play as your favorite characters from DC's exciting cinematic universe.

This character pack includes:

• Batman
• Wonder Woman
• The Flash
• Deathstroke
• Superman
• Cyborg

boardgame.name: LEGO DC Super-Villains Batman: The Animated Series Level Pack
boardgame.description:
Download now to get access to Batman: The Animated Series! This level pack is based on the Mask of the Phantasm. Fight Joker and Captain Clown alongside the Phantasm! This level pack includes:

• Batman
• Two-Face
• Captain Clown
• Harley Quinn
• Joker
• The Phantasm
• Man-Bat
• Mad Hatter

boardgame.name: LEGO DC Super-Villains Shazam! Movie Level Pack 1 & 2
boardgame.description: Download now to get access to Shazam! Movie Level Pack 1 & 2! Control your favorite characters based on the Shazam! film. Play as Billy Batson, Freddy Freeman, and Pedro Shazam to fight against the evil Dr. Sivana and his 7 Deadly Sins! Level Pack 1 & 2 includes Shazam, Freddy Shazam, The Wizard Shazam, Dr. Sivana and more.

boardgame.name: Ferner Osten DDR Würfelrallye
boardgame.description:
Players are divided into 2 groups, and each group should have an equal number of members with GDR knowledge. Each group starts with a "Trabbi" for a race, where by answering questions about the GDR, lucky coincidences, successful acting, etc. the journey can be accelerated. The winner is the group whose Trabbi reaches the finish line first.

—user summary

boardgame.name: LEGO DC Super-Villains Young Justice Level Pack
boardgame.description: Download now to get access to the Young Justice Level Pack. It is now up to you to take the role of members of the Young Justice League and defeat members of the The Light! What will the final fate of Aqualad and The Light be? Play as Aqualad, Artemis, Miss Martian, Kid Flash, and more to find out!

boardgame.name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 - Agents of Atlas
boardgame.description:
Get the Agents of Atlas Character Pack to play as the Super Hero team of misfits brought together by their leader Jimmy Woo. This Character Pack includes:
Jimmy Woo
Gorilla-Man
M-11
The Uranian
Venus

boardgame.name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 - Classic Guardians of the Galaxy
boardgame.description:
Before Star-Lord, Gamora, Drax, Rocket, and Groot another team held the mantle of Guardians of the Galaxy. Add the Classic Guardians Of The Galaxy to your roster now. This Character pack includes:
Charlie-27
Major Astro
Martinex
Yondu
Starhawk
Aleta Ogord
Nikki"

boardgame.name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 - Out of Time Character Pack
boardgame.description:
Expand your character roster with the Out of Time Character Pack. Play as time variant Super Heroes from across the Marvel Universe. This Character Pack includes:
Iron Man 2020
Lady Spider
Nosferata
Captain Assyria
Warmaker
Hulk 2099
Daredevil Noir

boardgame.name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 - Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
boardgame.description: Join the cosmic adventurers, Star-Lord, Gamora, Rocket Raccoon, Drax and Groot as you play through the epic opening sequence from Marvel Studios' Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2! In this film-inspired level pack, players will need to defend against and face an inter-dimensional monster – the Abilisk, by using each character's unique abilities.

boardgame.name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 - Champions Character Pack
boardgame.description:
Ms. Marvel! Nova! Miles Morales! This generation’s greatest Super Heroes unite with other young heroes from around the world to form The Champions! Download now to play as:
Ironheart
Devil Dinosaur
Moon Girl
Viv Vision & Sparky
Amadeus Cho
Nadia Pym Wasp
Kate Bishop
Nova

boardgame.name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 - Marvel's Black Panther Movie Character and Level Pack
boardgame.description: Download to get access to this level and character pack inspired by Marvel Studios' Black Panther. Set within the Kingdom of Wakanda, players will take the legendary Wakandan Super Hero and his sister Shuri on a dangerous mission within the darkest depths of their homeland, battling mutated creatures and arch-nemesis Erik Killmonger's vicious army.

boardgame.name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 - Cloak and Dagger
boardgame.description: Download this level and character pack to play as Cloak and Dagger! Set immediately after Cloak and Dagger gain their incredible powers, players must help the two escape their evil captor, his super powered henchman, and work together through a series of puzzles using their unique new abilities.

boardgame.name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 - Runaways
boardgame.description:
Download now to get access to the Runaways Character and Level Pack!

In this all-new Runaways comic inspired level pack, players will travel to the undersea Marine Vivarium, where they'll try to escape from the chaos and destruction that their criminal parents - 'The Pride', have brought upon them. Can you repair the Leapfrog vehicle and make your getaway before sinking to the bottom of the sea? Start your own Runaway adventure with playable characters like Nico Minoru, Karolina Dean, Gertrude Yorkes, Old Lace, Molly Hayes, Alex Wilder and Chase Stein.

boardgame.name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 - Marvel's Avengers: Infinity War Movie Level Pack
boardgame.description:
Download now to get access to the Marvel's Avengers: Infinity War Movie Inspired Character and Level Pack!

This action-packed level offers players the chance to control Thanos, one of the most dangerous Super Villains in the Marvel Universe, and his ruthless army. The Mad Titan and the Children of Thanos have invaded Attilan to take on Black Bolt and the Inhumans. Working as a team, the menacing crew must work their way through the various levels of Attilan before they are given the opportunity to break through to Black Bolt's throne. New unlockable characters include Thanos, Ebony Maw, Proxima Midnight and Corvus Glaive as well as a new teenage Groot and the massive Hulkbuster Mark 2.

boardgame.name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 - Marvel's Ant-Man and the Wasp Character and Level Pack
boardgame.description:
Download now to get access to the Marvel's Ant-Man and the Wasp Character and Level Pack!

This action-packed level takes Ant-Man and the Wasp to Hank Pym's forgotten research lab, where his old adversary Egghead is hatching a fiendish plan. Players are tasked with battling Egghead's goons and a giant chicken mech in an unforgettable adventure.

boardgame.name: Pandemic: On the Brink - Virulent Strain
boardgame.description:
You thought you found the cure, but what happens when the diseases get stronger?

When your first epidemic appears, one of the diseases will become the Virulent Strain, a more aggressive and trickier disease. This disease can spread faster and is more difficult to cure, creating a new challenge for you and your team. Work together to utilize your special skills and contain this new pandemic!

Can you save humanity?

boardgame.name: Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood of Venice – Tower
boardgame.description: A 9.5" tower miniature and associated haycart to bring dimension to your board.

boardgame.name: Arcmage: Shadow Waves
boardgame.description:
The fourth core set of our libre fantasy style strategic card game Arcmage.

As you battle your opponents summoning creatures and casting spells, you’ll have to defend your cities, manage your resources and power supply and conjure up a strategical plan to beat your opponents. Will you be the one that brings order to the warring factions in Irdiya? Will you challenge all and utter the words ‘Amin duna, ilya lanta’?

This turn based game allows a player to gather resources, build cities, cast and move creatures, recruit an army, play magic spells or interrupt an opponents' play. Each turn the player may launch an attack on an a target city. On opponents' turns players may have to bravely defend their cities against the marauding enemy's army. Lose all of your cities and you're out of the game.

Following the tradition of many great CCG's, the game supports both casual as in depth strategic game play. Furthermore it offers an unique resource system and adds a spacial dimension that lets the player decide how and where to deploy their creatures.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: The Road to the Majors
boardgame.description:
From the Introduction --
This is a RPG where you will create a single baseball player and take him through his entire professional career. You will get drafted by a Major League Team, start in AA and have to work your way up training and developing your player so he can be the best of the best. How far will you go?? The Majors?? All-Star Game?? Cooperstown?? Find Out Now!!

boardgame.name: Crisis at Steamfall: Genesis – Kickstarter Promo pack
boardgame.description:
64 promo cards unlocked during the Kickstarter campain.

27 Relic items cards
27 Workshop items cards
2 Crisis cards
8 Event cards

boardgame.name: Pandemic: On the Brink - Roles & Events
boardgame.description:
With humanity on the brink of extinction, you’ll have to recruit an elite team of specialists to eradicate the diseases spreading across the globe. Pick from 6 brand new roles to assemble the best team.

Increase your actions with the Generalist, keep a disease crisis under control with the Containment Specialist, or gather extra knowledge with the Archivist. The Field Operative and Troubleshooter will help you stay one step ahead, while the Epidemiologist’s special skill will help with your research for the cures.

In addition to the 6 new roles, there are also 8 new event cards for even more variety. If finding cures is becoming routine on the Heroic difficulty, tackle a new challenge at the Legendary level!

boardgame.name: Pandemic - On the Brink: Mutation
boardgame.description:
You thought you saved humanity already? "On the Brink: Mutation" DLC brings a fifth, special, highly dangerous and purple, disease to eradicate.

During infections, the Mutation will pop up unpredictably and becomes a new disease to fight in contaminated cities. Making the game more challenging than ever before, this disease divides the team’s efforts and will cost them precious time.

You’ll need to plan ahead and coordinate the whole team to fight the new virus and find a cure for the 5th disease.

boardgame.name: Battletech: Field Report – DCMS
boardgame.description:
Field Report: DCMS describes the state of the Draconis Combine in the wake of the events described in Jihad Hot Spots: Terra, including the overall military and logistical condition of one of the Great Houses who stood against the Word of Blake menace. Battered, but unbowed, by enemies both within and without, the armies of House Kurita remain a force to be reckoned with, as a new age dawns.

Field Reports are detailed references for creating scenarios & adventures.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat
BattleTech: A Time of War – The BattleTech RPG

boardgame.name: Battletech: Field Report – FWLM
boardgame.description:
Field Report: FWLM describes the state of the Free Worlds League in the wake of the events described in Jihad Hot Spots: Terra, including the overall military and logistical condition of one of the Great Houses who stood against the Word of Blake menace. Subverted by the Word of Blake, and torn asunder in the fires of madness and betrayal, the League stands divided, and the armies of the once-great House of Marik now teeter on the brink of dissolution at the threshold of a new era.

Field Reports are detailed references for creating scenarios & adventures.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat
BattleTech: A Time of War – The BattleTech RPG

boardgame.name: Battletech: Field Report – LAAF
boardgame.description:
Field Report: LAAF describes the state of the Lyran Alliance in the wake of the events described in Jihad Hot Spots: Terra, including the overall military and logistical condition of one of the Great Houses who stood against the Word of Blake menace. Mauled by the Word of Blake and the Clans alike mere months after the end of a bloody civil war, the battle weary House of Steiner now struggles to recover its strength at the dawn of a new era…

Field Reports are detailed references for creating scenarios & adventures.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat
BattleTech: A Time of War – The BattleTech RPG

boardgame.name: Battletech: Field Report – Periphery
boardgame.description:
Field Report: Periphery describes the state of the various Periphery states in the wake of the events described in Jihad Hot Spots: Terra, including the overall military and logistical condition of the minor powers that exist on the fringes of the war-ravaged Inner Sphere. Whether plagued by piracy, ravaged by Word of Blake terror cells, or simply struggling to maintain their independence in a time of chaos, the various realms of the Periphery now struggle to rebuild as a new era beckons…

Field Reports are detailed references for creating scenarios & adventures.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat
BattleTech: A Time of War – The BattleTech RPG

boardgame.name: Ninjajakten
boardgame.description:
Sneak out of the castle - without getting caught!
Now you have been at the Ninja school for a long time… You have trained a lot and your Sensei says that you are ready for the final exam: You will sneak around in the Ninja castle together, collect all the equipment a Ninja needs - and sneak out through the gate without Sensei catching your.

If you manage to do that, you will be approved Ninjas. But time is limited!

Exciting adventure games that require cooperation. You win or lose together!

You are a group of Ninja students at the Ninja School and have trained hard together to pass the final test to
become approved Ninjas. You should sneak around together
in school and find the various Ninja gear like your Sensei, hidden in the classrooms on school at the castle.
But you have limited time! You all have to have time to take you to the Ceremony Room and out of the castle before Sensei gets there, and besides, you must all have gathered at least
one Ninja gear each.
Be careful! If Sensei sees you (ends up in the same
room like you) then he punishes you by sending
back to the start box! Sensei has also placed
out cages you can get stuck in.
If you succeed, you have passed the test and will be approved
Ninjas. But if Sensei comes before you to the Ceremony Room. Then you have all failed…
But you can do the test again!
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: WOW! What a World of Entertainment AB

boardgame.name: Magiska monsterjakten
boardgame.description:
You and your friends must free your pets from the monsters!
Monsters have robbed your pets of your city. The adults have not been able to stop them, but now you and your friends have decided that it must be enough! You have figured out a way to disguise yourself as a monster and go into their villages to save your pets. You have to dress in the right color combinations - then the magic locks open!

The one who saves the most pets wins the game round and becomes the biggest hero in your city!

You start the game with 1-3 masking parts and changes / develops during the game by acquiring different parts: head, wings, tail, feet and so on. During the game, you may want to change the color combination on your masking parts depending on what colors the different magic locks to the villages have. Masking parts are placed in special squares on the board where you have to go to collect them.

If you have enough masking parts in the right color combination, you can open the lock to a village. For example, if one lock to a village have two red and one yellow square, you can get into that village if you have at least two red mask parts and at least one yellow masking member. You must hit the dice high enough to reach up to the red dice mark. You stay always on the red dice whether you have more steps left, then roll the dice again and move corresponding step into the village or castle. Each box has a number with plus or minus: add up all the numbers from the boxes you pass and land on - the sum is the number of animal tokens you can pick up.

Then to get into the castle, where you have a chance
To free most animals, you must have five masking parts with at least one part in each color (yellow, green & red) to get inside. This is the hardest to do, but you can also save the most pets here.
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: WOW! What a World of Entertainment AB

boardgame.name: Trolljakten
boardgame.description:
Escape from the trolls - before it's too late. A fun and exciting strategy game for everyone.
When you and your friends are out in the woods, you are taken by the evil mountain troll and his changes. Now you are stuck down in The troll mountain and have to get out before you are transformed into a troll - or something even worse…

There are two roads out, but both paths and bridges are in poor condition and full of holes. As a team, you must collect enough different cards so that you can change to your stone and wooden plank tokens to make a way out, and at the same time avoid being stopped by the trolls…. The exciting escape can begin!

In Trolljakten, each round consists of two parts - first a card part where you pick up new cards and then play as many cards as you want: fix roads, bridges, move trolls or change cards.

When you have finished the card, roll the dice and move one of the team's three game pieces.

The game is both exciting and fun. The more you play the more you discover the different strategies you can use to avoid the trolls, and be the first team to get out of the troll mountain.

—description from the publisher (translated)
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: WOW! What a World of Entertainment AB

boardgame.name: Blood Bowl (Second Edition): Khorne Team – The Skull-Tribe Slaughterers
boardgame.description:
Khornate Blood Bowl teams often find themselves at a disadvantage in leagues due to their inability to put scoring touchdowns ahead of goring their opponents. Against all odds, the Skull-tribe Slaughterers buck this trend, believing that the higher they rank in leagues, the better calibre of skull they will be able to claim for Khorne. As a result, the Skull-tribe Slaughterers have made their extremely bloody mark in the NAF as one of the greatest teams around.

Want a team that can both mutilate your opponent with ease, and score a good touchdown? Khorne teams have plenty of brawn and just enough brain to make it happen. Marauder Linemen are hardy enough to withstand plenty of punishment and smart enough to remember to pass the ball once in a match. Those who endure the brutal training regimes of Khornate teams become Bloodseekers. Impressively violent and single-mindedly bloodthirsty, they specialise in putting the opposition out of commission while offloading any erstwhile Blood Bowl balls to the team's Khorngors – houndlike Beastmen who are utterly intent on scoring touchdowns.

The multi-part kit is comprised of 64 plastic components with which you can assemble The Skull-tribe Slaughterers, a Khorne team for use in games of Blood Bowl. The team is made up of six Bloodborn Marauder Linemen, four Bloodseekers, and two Khorngor. This box also contains two double-sided Blood Bowl coins, two turn and re-roll markers, four Blood Bowl balls, and a transfer sheet with 222 symbols and icons to customise your team with. This kit is also supplied with 12x 32mm Citadel Round slotta bases.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Blood Bowl (Second Edition): Khorne Team – Card Pack
boardgame.description: Redesigned for the Second Season ruleset, this deck of 44 cards will help you keep track of stats and profiles for your team, positions, and Star Players – plus Special Play cards exclusively for use with Khorne teams.

boardgame.name: Penguin race
boardgame.description:
Be the first to bring your penguins to safety over the open sea before the ice bridges melt! The five bridges are made of real ice, so you have to put the mould for the bridge´s in the freezer before you play. There are two sets of moulds so you always have bridge´s to play with. You have to cross the bridge´s before they melt and collapses. If one bridge melts, take another way with a bridge still intact.
Sabotage by destroying strategic ice bridges by spraying water or pouring salt, or give your competitors a cold shower so they fall into the sea and start their hike again.

Two sets of bridges, so one can always be in the freezer!

A fun & different game that engages!

How the game is played:

The player that first moves their penguins across the ice to the goal has won. The other the team's start is your goal. But hurry up before the ice bridges are melting, and watch out for falling in the water!
Every time it's your turn, you should:

Roll the dice, and possibly move a penguin.
Pick up an event card.


Use one or two cards (your choice).
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: WOW! What a World of Entertainment AB

boardgame.name: Einstein Géniusz: Kérdezz-felelek
Genialt frågespel Tankenötter
boardgame.description:
Are you a new Einstein… Or not…? Challenge your inner genius in this test of thinking outside the box. The answers can be surprising! You often have to think a little differently to defeat your opponents - to be first in the finish.

A player turns over the hourglass and reads the questions on the card. You must answer as many questions as you can before the hourglass is empty. You can move your game piece 1 step per correct answer, in straight lines (up, down, right, left), not diagonally. Two players can not stand in the same square.

To get into another player's dimension (part of the game board), you must be in a square adjacent to their dimension and answer a question correctly. The winner is the player who first enters another player's dimension.
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: WOW! What a World of Entertainment AB

boardgame.name: Blood Bowl (Second Edition): Khorne Team – Double Sized Pitch and Dugouts
boardgame.description:
This set contains a double-sided, fold-out Blood Bowl pitch and dugouts depicting the home stadium of a Khorne team. One side features the stadium in its standard skull-strewn conditions, and the other the same stadium when the teams have, temporarily, sated Khorne's thirst for violence.

The pitch is made to the same specifications as the board included with the Blood Bowl boxed game, and includes rules for play with each side.

boardgame.name: Tänka lika
boardgame.description:
A word card is placed, everyone must then write a word on their own writing boards that complements the word card to a new word - if TWO players think alike, they get three points each, if three or more think alike, maybe it was a little easier and then they get that wrote the same one point each. If you have written something that no one else has thought of… then you will not get any points for this card. But there will be more cards!

—description from the publisher (translated)
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: WOW! What a World of Entertainment AB

boardgame.name: Blood Bowl (Second Season): Spike! Journal #13
boardgame.description:
The exceptionally fierce Terrence "the Butcher" Iansson wipes the blood off his hands just long enough to guest edit this issue of Spike! Journal packed with eightfold treats. That's right, it's a Khorne special, focusing on those who play to appease the god of skulls.

Featuring 36 crimson-hued pages, this magazine covers the history, rules, and rosters of the Khorne team. Alongside all the tales of violence, violence, and more violence, you'll find the fantastic fun and essential commentary you've come to expect from Spike! Journal. As such, this magazine is the perfect companion for the savvy (and bloodthirsty) coach.

It includes:

Blood for the Blood God: delve into the background and history of Khorne teams, the various player positions, Star Players, and a team roster.
Famous Khorne Teams: what do Khorne's Killers, The Bloodsoaked Bruisers, The Flesh Hounds, and The Khornate Cripplers all have in common? They all donated an overwhelming number of skulls to Khorne this season, and they feature in this section covering the many teams that play for blood.
The Skull-tribe Slaughterers Team Spotlight: a special in-depth article focusing on one of the few Khorne teams to reach the epiphany that winning games means more chances to claim better quality skulls. Includes a team profile featuring team colours, honours, Spike! team rating as well as the roster of their famous 2497-2498 squad, and loads more.
Star Player Spotlight – Grashnak Blackhoof: a renowned Blitzer known as "The Great Black Bull" often considered one of the most violent players to ever grace the gridiron.
Chat With the Rat: everyone's favour-best rat Hackspit Quillchewer takes the time to talk to the owner of the Khornate Cripplers, Overlord Kolgan Bloodrage, about their storied rivalry with the Slaaneshi Sidewinders.
Star Player Spotlight – Scyla Anfingrimm: a wrecking ball of muscle on the pitch, Scyla's unique brand of violence has given him heaps of adoring fans and sponsorship deals despite no one knowing where he came from.
Chaos Leagues: all-new rules and advice to help you run Chaos Leagues – a variant on the standard Blood Bowl League Season. The Cursed Skull Goblet is open to all teams, however each team participating must select one of the four Chaos Gods or Chaos Undivided as their patron. Includes rules such as a Wrath of Khorne Weather Table, Khornate Kick-off Table, unique post-game sequences, and special rules for the Altar of Khorne Blood Bowl Pitch and Khornate balls.
Dirt From the Dugout: Mindy Piewhistle delivers another steaming hot pile of gossip, this time focussing on the underhanded means the Crimson Butchers have been using to convert rival fans into Khorne worshippers.
Eviscerate and Exsanguinate: this is your guide to getting the most out of your skull-loving Marauders. Includes an overview of the strengths of the Khorne team (violence) positions, tactics (enacting violence), how to start out, and how to develop your team over a league, as well as examples of offensive and defensive set-ups. Surprising no one, Khorne teams prefer offence.
Star Player Spotlight – Max Spleenripper: innovative and skilled with a chainsaw, Max has become a must-have player in Khorne teams and a household name. Find out how he earned the name 'Spleenripper' right here.
Ask Lord Borak: curious Blood Bowl fans have their questions answered by the fearsome Lord Borak.
Coffin Corner: plenty of players have lost their heads over the years, pleasing Khorne greatly. This regular column remembers those who died, willingly or not, in tribute to the Blood God.
Mighty Blow! – New Brawls Please: this comic takes a look back at one of Bob Bifford's games against a Khorne team.

boardgame.name: Blood Bowl (Second Season Edition): Khorne Team Dice Set
boardgame.description:
Contents:
3 Block Dice
2 Six-sided Dice with the Khorne Team Icon in place of the "6"
1 Eight-sided Scatter Die
1 Sixteen-sided Die

boardgame.name: echoes: Der Ring
echoes: L'Anneau
echoes: The Cursed Ring
boardgame.description:
An antique heirloom persecutes a young woman with bad luck. Listen to the origin of the ring and reveal the truth behind an ancient curse in echoes: The Cursed Ring.

echoes is a co-operative audio mystery game. Using the free app, players listen to mysterious noises and voices that are connected to the playing material. Together they look for hints in the sound bites to bring the story parts in order and solve the case.

In more detail, your task is to assemble the 24 parts of the story in the right order; each part is represented by an object — either a game board or a card — and its associated echo. The entire story is divided into six chapters, with each chapter being represented by a game board. By scanning the objects with the app, you'll hear the echo connected with each object, and by using conversations and noises in the echo, you try to figure out which three object cards are associated with a chapter and in which order they should be placed. If you're not correct, the app will inform you which cards are incorrect or in the wrong place; if you are correct, you can listen to the entire chapter all at once — and you should since new, additional hints can then be heard.

The objects themselves also provide you with clues from time to time, so neglect no details.

—description from the publisher
