boardgame.name: Picky Kitty
boardgame.description: Spin the spinner to see what to feed the kitty. But be careful...give him too many veggies and he will flip his plate! Be the first player to feed the kitty all of your vegetables without the kitty flipping your veggies to win!

boardgame.name: Most Cutest
boardgame.description:
Is Amy Doghouse cuter than Authur the baby rhino? What about Meatball the Meerkat? It’s all relative as you take turns picking the Most Cutest animal around, and trying to guess how the other players voted.

Gameplay is simple; draw a series of adorable animal cards face up onto the table, and take turns being the cuteness critic, secretly choosing which you think is the cutest. Then the other players take turns guessing your choice and earning points along the way.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Welcome to Real Vegas
boardgame.description: Bring home the excitement of a Las Vegas casino in a board game. Players work their way around the board as a group and play all the great casino games including Poker, Blackjack, Roulette and Craps. The winner is the player who has the most money when the first person crosses the finish line.

boardgame.name: Turf War: Fantasy Theme Pack
boardgame.description:
The Fantasy Theme Pack expands the base Turf War with a set of fantasy-themed cards to replace each player's starting cards, as well as 5 new fantasy-themed Neighbor cards that can be shuffled into the Neighbor deck.

The re-themed cards include 2 "Treasure Chest" Piggy Banks, 2 "Dragon's Hoard" Piggy Bank Tracks, 2 "Castle / Adventure" Home / Away cards, 2 "Throne Room" Garages, and a "Dungeon" Trash card.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Turf War: Store Playmat
boardgame.description: A mat for organizing the common Store, Trash, and Unswayed Neighbors play areas. Made of rubber-backed neoprene.

boardgame.name: Turf War: Yard Playmat
boardgame.description: A mat for organizing your individual play areas (Yard, Piggy Bank, Garage, Home / Away, and Sway). Made of rubber-backed neoprene.

boardgame.name: Turf War: Collector's Box
boardgame.description: A rigid storage box for Turf War, its expansions, and its playmats, originally sold as part of collector's bundles.

boardgame.name: Pathways
boardgame.description:
Pathways is a two-player flicking, dexterity game played on a uniquely crafted bamboo board with acrylic disks. The board has 46 symmetrical holes in a chessboard pattern.

The goal of the game is for players to flick their 12 disks, in-turn, across the board into the opposite furthest row. As disks fall into the holes on the board, they create new flat surfaces making follow up shots easier. The player that gets most of their disks into their target row wins the game.

There are specific match-game rules, where players compete to reach 11 points.

The game board roughly measures about 12” x 15” and fits on most any surface and is easily portable.

—description from the designer
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: [BGDL Community Spotlight] Designing an Abstract Dexterity Game with Frank Sarro

boardgame.name: Ecosystem
boardgame.description:
A cooperative ecology-themed board game for having fun with friends and relatives and learning to respect the environment!

The aim of the game is to clean up the earth and help to safeguard its natural beauty: by extinguishing fires, reducing smog and pollution in our cities and clearing waste from the oceans.

The game relies on cooperative rules to remind the family about the importance to take care of our planet all together.

The aim of games of the Play for Future range is to help everyone understand the importance of sustainability and respect for the environment through play.

Conceived, designed and developed in Italy.

boardgame.name: Project CARS - Limited Edition Upgrade
boardgame.description:
Featuring cars from the Touring, Road, Prototype, and GT disciplines, the Limited Edition Car Pack contains five legendary cars with a combined top speed of over 1200 km/h and 2000+ horsepower!

• McLaren F1 – Featuring a central driving position and butterfly doors, the McLaren F1 is one of the fastest production cars ever made with a 0-60 time just over 3 seconds
• Sauber C9 – This Group C Prototype still holds one of the fastest records at Le Mans with wins in all but one race of the World Championship in 1989
• BMW M1 ProCar – Driven by legends such as Niki Lauda and Nelson Piquet, and with a custom paint job by artist Andy Warhol, the M1 ProCar is iconic in motorsports culture
• Mercedes-AMG C-Class Coupe DTM – Building upon its predecessor that was the most successful car in the 28-year history of DTM, the C-Class Coupe DTM is stronger and safer making it one of the most competitive cars running in DTM today
• 1967 Ford Mk IV – Winner of both the 1967 Le Mans 24H and Sebring 12H, and driven by legendary driver Mario Andretti, the Mk IV still holds the record of being the only American car to have ever won the classic endurance race

boardgame.name: Project CARS - Racing Icons Car Pack
boardgame.description:
Expand your Prototype and GT rosters with two uncompromising and beautiful machines from the prestigious heritage of Bentley – the Speed 8 and Continental GT3 - and three further racing icons: the Le Mans-winning BMW V12 LMR and McLaren F1 GTR, and the Mercedes-Benz CLK LM.
All have prestigious history in the world of motorsports.

boardgame.name: Project CARS - Audi Ruapuna Speedway Expansion
boardgame.description:
The first Track Expansion for Project CARS includes Prototype and GT cars from Audi, and a new location to race at: New Zealand motor racing circuit Ruapuna Park…
• Ruapuna Park GP
• Ruapuna Park Club
• Ruapuna Park Outer Loop
• Ruapuna Park A Circuit
• Ruapuna Park B Circuit
• Audi R8 LMP900
• Audi R18 e-tron Quattro
• Audi 90 IMSA GTO

boardgame.name: Briley Witch Chronicles
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Briley Witch Chronicles is a turn based JRPG for Commodore 64. Programming, graphics, and sound by Sarah Jane Avory. Sprite portraits, additional sprites, and bitmap touch-up by by Paolo Rathjen.

boardgame.name: Project CARS - Modified Car Pack
boardgame.description:
Add three limited-run custom machines to your garage with the Modified Car Pack – the Pagani Zonda Cinque Roadster, Ariel Atom 3 Mugen, and the all-new Ruf CTR3 SMS-R…
• With only five chassis ever built, the Pagani Zonda Cinque Roadster is an open-top hypercar with a monstrous top speed, racecar levels of downforce, and extravagant beauty to match its multi-million dollar price tag.
• Created in celebration of the ten year anniversary of the original ground-breaking track racer, the Ariel Atom 3 takes just 2.9 seconds to go from 0-60.
• Further blurring the lines between reality and gaming, the Ruf CTR3 SMS-R is the result of a collaboration between veteran developers Slightly Mad Studios and Ruf to make a race-spec version of the already-impressive CTR3 super sports car.

boardgame.name: Project CARS - Old Vs New Car Pack
boardgame.description:
Featuring three retro machines and their modern-day counterparts, the Old Vs New Car Pack showcases the lineage of three major manufacturers - Ford, BMW, and Ruf.

Introduced in 1964, the Ford Mustang quickly became one of the company's most-recognizable models, single handedly starting the Muscle car revolution that shaped the American car market for more than a decade.
After the first one million road cars of the original Mustang had been build, Ford gave its best-seller an extensive upgrade, equipping the car with a more powerful 4.7 liter V8 engine and introducing the now-iconic Fastback body style.
Now, in 2015, the Mustang GT is the newest addition to Ford’s iconic range. Powered by a massive 5-liter V8 engine and delivering more than 428hp of power and 528 Nm of torque, buyers can choose between a full manual and automatic six-speed gearbox, the latter coming with genuine shifting paddles – a first in the long history of the Mustang.

Based on the Porsche 911 3.2, the 1987 CTR Yellowbird is one of Ruf’s most iconic models that has helped build Ruf's reputation for building no-compromise sports cars. The 3.4 liter twin-turbocharged flat six engine provided 469hp from two large turbo chargers & intercoolers and had been equipped with a new Bosch Motronic as well as an ignition setup originally designed for Porsche’s 962 Group C race car. Thanks to extensive weight-saving measures such as usage of fiberglass and aluminum, the CTR weighs just 1150 kilograms, resulting in a very impressive performance.

BMW's 2002 Turbo road car made the history books in 1973 by becoming Europe's first-ever mass-produced road car powered by a turbocharged engine. The 2002 Turbo's two-liter four cylinder engine provided 170hp of power, a figure that made the 2002 one of the most powerful cars on the road during its time. Unfortunately, the 1974 oil crisis forced an end to the 2002 Turbo's production after just one year as gas prices were soaring across the world. Only 1672 cars were produced during the model's limited production run, making the 2002 Turbo one of BMW's most iconic and most sought-after classics.
Built to the Super 2000 touring car regulations, the 320TC is BMW's weapon of choice for competition in the World Touring Car Championship (WTCC) and countless national touring car series around the globe.
Weighing 1170 kilograms, the car is powered by a 1.6 litreDI-turbo four-cylinder engine and a full adjustable six-speed sequential gearbox. Driven by veteran touring car aces such as Tom Coronel, Franz Engstler & Stefano D'Aste, the 320TC clinched five world championship wins.

boardgame.name: Project CARS - Aston Martin Track Expansion
boardgame.description:
Mojave is a private testing ground secluded in the wilderness of Nevada. The Mojave circuit comprises of five race layouts and a special open Test Track layout allowing players to freely practice and test their car’s performance/handling via Banked Oval, Drag Strip, Hillclimb, Skid Pan, and Tight Corner sections.

1959 Aston Martin DBR1
Designed by Ted Cutting and powered by an Aston Martin 2943cc straight six engine, the DBR1 rose to fame as Aston Martin’s first ever Le Mans champion.

2009 Aston Martin DBR1-2
Built to the LMP1 class prototype rules, the DBR1-2 is a closed-cockpit race car, powered by the company's proven 6-litre V12 engine. The DBR1-2 did not only hold up well at Le Mans, it also helped the team clinch the 2009 Le Mans Series Championships, driven by elite sports car racing aces such as Darren Turner, Stefan Mücke & Tomas Enge.

2014 Aston Martin Vantage GTE
The Vantage GTE has clinched countless poles, podiums, wins and fastest laps in sports car races around the globe, including classics such as the Le Mans 24 Hours and the Sebring 12 Hours.

Both the Aston Martin Vantage GTE and DBR 1-2 can be used in career with brand-new contracts that further expand your possibilities, whilst three new invitational events take you to Mojave.

boardgame.name: Project CARS - Japanese Car Pack
boardgame.description:
Project CARS continues its programme of continual updates and delivery of fresh new content with the release of the fan-requested Japanese Car Pack featuring two amazing Mitsubishi machines, 2014 Toyota Le Mans hybrid, the 2012 Toyota GT86/Toyota 86, and the latest Rocket Bunny Editions of both the Toyota GT-86 and Scion FR-S.

- 1999 Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution VI TME
- 2008 Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution IX FQ-360
- 2012 Toyota GT86 / Toyota 86
- 2015 Scion FR-S Rocket Bunny Edition
- 2015 Toyota GT-86 Rocket Bunny GT Edition
- 2014 Toyota TS040 Hybrid

boardgame.name: Project CARS - Classic Lotus Track Expansion
boardgame.description:
Project CARS continues its commitment to deliver fresh new content and updates via its ON DEMAND programme today with the release of the Classic Lotus Track Expansion featuring four historic Classic Team Lotus cars and three historic locations to drive them on.

Historic Classic Team Lotus cars:
- 1965 Lotus Type 40 Ford
- 1963 Lotus Type 25 Climax (F1)
- 1966 Lotus Type 38 Ford (Indy)
- 1967 Lotus Type 51 (FF)

Historic locations:
- Rouen les Essarts
- Hockenheim Classic
- Silverstone Classic

boardgame.name: Project CARS - Renault Sport Car Pack
boardgame.description:
Project CARS continues its programme of continual updates and delivery of fresh new content with the release of the Renault Sport Car Pack featuring five breathtaking machines from the legendary performance and special vehicles division of Renault.

• 2015 Renault Sport R.S. 01
A purebred racer down to the core, the R.S. 01 is Renault Sport Technology's newest creation for on-track competition.

• 2015 Formula Renault 3.5
The Formula Renault 3.5 Series is a major step on the career ladder of drivers aiming to make it to the highest echelons of open wheel racing.

• 2014 Renault Mégane R.S. 275 Trophy-R
The Mégane R.S. 275 Trophy-R continues Renault’s tradition of class-leading hot hatches, creating a racy track special that proves a lot of racing spirit can hide in hatchback form.

• 2009 Renault Mégane Trophy V6
Built by Renault Sport Technologies, the Megane Trophy V6 was used in Renault’s long-running Eurocup Megane Trophy racing series all across Europe.

• 1978 Renault Alpine A442B
The 442B is one of Renault’s most successful race cars ever built, helping the French company to its only overall victory at the legendary 24 Heures du Mans.

boardgame.name: Project CARS - Stanceworks Track Expansion
boardgame.description:
KTM X-Bow-R

The X-Bow is motorcycle specialist’s KTM first ever car creation as the Austrian company has entered the sports car market with an innovative no-frills roadster.

MX-5 RadBul Formula Drift

Formula Drift Racing star “Mad” Mike Whiddett has gained a reputation for building some of the most extreme drifting machinery on this planet and his newest project is undoubtedly the most spectacular – The MX-5 RadBul Formula Drift.

BMW 1-Series M-Coupé Stanceworks Edition

Inspired by the BMW experts over at Stanceworks, the 1-Series M-Coupé Stanceworks Edition is a special edition of BMW’s popular 1-Series road car already available in Project CARS.

BMW 2002 Turbo Stanceworks Edition

Stanceworks have also created a special version of a true BMW classic, as Project CARS users can exclusively enjoy the BMW 2002 Turbo Stanceworks edition.

Bannochbrae

Over 4.5 miles long, this new road course situated in the highlands of Scotland takes drivers through the village of Bannochbrae

boardgame.name: Project CARS - US Race Car Pack
boardgame.description:
2015 Chevrolet Corvette C7.R
The Chevrolet Corvette C7.R is the latest generation of Corvette’s ultra-successful Corvette GT race cars that have established a stronghold in international sports car and endurance racing.

2015 Cadillac ATS-V.R GT3
Starting in 2015, Cadillac joined the ultra-competitive GT3 racing scene with the brand-new ATS-V.R.

2014 Dallara DW12 Indycar
Named DW12 in honor of the late Dan Wheldon, the DW12 is Dallara’s design for competition in the Verizon Indycar Series, North America’s most prestigous open-wheel racing series and home of the world-famous Indianapolis 500 race.

2016 Ford Fusion Stock Car
Players who are looking for something different will love the 2016 Ford Fusion Stock Car that poises a very different driving challenge.

boardgame.name: Project CARS - Pagani Nürburgring Combined Track Expansion
boardgame.description:
Pagani Huayra BC
In 2011, Pagani’s Huayra took the world of supercars by storm as the prestigious Italian sports car manufacturer delivered a turbo-powered car for the very first time. Four years later, all of the strictly-limited 100 units as have sold as Pagani celebrates the model’s success with the brand-new Huayra BC.

Pagani Zonda Revolucion
The Revolucion is Zonda’s last hooray for their famed Zonda R sports car as the Italian sports car maker ends the car’s production run with an ultra-rare, ultra-competitive version of their record-breaking creation.

Nürburgring Nordschleife + Grand Prix Track
Project CARS is inviting drivers to tackle the ultimate Nürburgring challenge, giving players access to the combined Nürburgring Grand Prix and Nordschleife layout.

boardgame.name: Rise of the Tomb Raider - 20 Year Celebration Pack
boardgame.description: In the wake of her father’s death, Lara’s uncle challenges her ownership of Croft Manor. Lara must explore her childhood home in the new “Blood Ties” story mode to reclaim her legacy and uncover a family mystery that will change her life forever. In “Lara’s Nightmare” hordes of the undead overrun Croft Manor, and Lara must defend it before the nightmare overwhelms her! “Blood Ties” includes over an hour of additional single player story, as well as community challenges with card modifiers that allow you to compete against your friends’ scores in “Lara’s Nightmare”. This pack also includes five classic Lara Croft skins, an outfit and weapon inspired by Tomb Raider III, and the new “Extreme Survivor” difficulty setting for the main campaign. With over an hour of new story, a replayable combat mode, classic skins, a new outfit and weapon, and a new difficulty mode, this is the perfect way to celebrate 20 years of the iconic Lara Croft.

boardgame.name: Tyrants of the Underdark: reDrewno Insert
boardgame.description: Insert for Tyrants of the Underdark: Board Game
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Tyrants of the Underdark: Board Game

boardgame.name: Glen More II: Chronicles – reDrewno Insert
Glen More II: Kroniki – reDrewno Insert
boardgame.description: Insert for Glen More II: Chronicles with Highland Games expansion.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Glen More II: Chronicles – Highland Games
Glen More II: Chronicles – Promo 2: Lowland Clans
Glen More II: Chronicles – promo 3: What Lurks Beneath

boardgame.name: Food Chain Magnate: reDrewno Insert
boardgame.description: Insert for Food Chain Magnate

boardgame.name: Thunderstone Quest: To the Barricades
boardgame.description:
To the Barricades - the Kickstarter Reward - included two Quests and the really big box plus the Barricades mode components.

Barricades mode - the retail product - includes just the Barricades Mode components and comes in a small box.

boardgame.name: Open Portals
boardgame.description:
Open Portals is a deck of 56 fully illustrated playing cards that also comes with a manual that teaches players how to play a new and inventive multiplayer card game. Open Portals also doubles as an Oracle deck.
—description from the designer

The game is a decorated standard deck of cards, with four suited jokers. The object of the game is to get the most points, and you get one point for each Portal (number card) Opened (in front of you at the end of a round), as well as some bonus points. Each player is dealt 14 cards and then cards are passed until every player has one Magic (Ace) card. Then each players particular Magic card is played down to show their suit. Each turn you may play one card in front of you. God (face) cards are special action cards that let you take the action listed on it when you play it. Portals may only be Opened if the suit matches your Magic card. Once a Portal is Opened, you may Open Portals of others suits matching that Portals numbers too. And if you play a Myth (Joker) card in front of you, you can then Open Portals matching that Myth card too. A round ends once all God cards have been played. The winner is the first person to 36 points, or whomever has the most points after 3 rounds.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Paladins of the West Kingdom + City of Crowns: The GiftForge Insert
boardgame.description:
Compatible with:
Paladins of the West Kingdom
Paladins of the West Kingdom: City of Crowns

Details
Tested with premium sleeved cards.
This product does not require assembly.

Insert size: 21,7 cm x 21,7 cm x 7,1 cm.
Lid fit: The insert is available with or without lid support. If you would like to store it in one box than you will need the lid support to keep the components safe.
Material: 3 mm birch wood.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Paladins of the West Kingdom: City of Crowns

boardgame.name: The Excellents Game Diary
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Now you can keep track of all your princess adventures in this handy diary! There's space to record 9 of your own princess characters with notes and drawings! We've added seven new ready to play princesses to include in your adventures. Plus a new Awesome World adventure including Nancy Druid!

boardgame.name: Competing Cat Castles
boardgame.description:
Four kingdoms exist, in the four cardinal directions of the map. The snow leopards in the mountains to the north, the jaguars to the east in the plains, the tigers to the south near the jungle, and the lions to the west in the grasslands. These four kingdoms have been at war for as long as can be remembered - and they’ve built nuance to their battle plans over centuries. Can you lead your Kingdom to victory?

Competing Cat Castles is a game of deduction, risk, and luck for 2-4 players. Your goal is to win more competitions than your opponents. Each round you will select one of the nine cards representing the key players in each kingdom. Every cat plays a part, from the Monarch down to the youngest baby. Several of these key players have abilities that can hinder your opponent, or boost your next turn. Players play their chosen cat face down and reveal them simultaneously. The cat with the highest power wins, after any abilities have been applied.

Keeping track of who your opponents have played and who you have to counter them will lead to victory, but never discount luck.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Esopya
boardgame.description:
Esopya is a card game for 1-4 players. It is played on a tactical board and the purpose of the game is to defeat the rival kingdom by summoning creatures that move across the battlefield or by casting powerful spells.

Esopya is also the name of a fantasy world. During its ancient history, many different civilizations were born: Elves, Dwarves, Humans, Vampires, Ogres, Sorcerers and so many others.

From the planet, it is possible to assimilate a very powerful energy source: Mana. It is a resource that allows people to grow and dominate others. Some defend their sources, others seek for new ones.

You can build your own deck, with your own tactics, or play with a ready-to-play one.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Tiefenrausch
boardgame.description:
Vendetta is a cooperative deductive murder mystery game where players must solve puzzles, follow clues and make decisions to solve a case. They do this using the included deck of cards, 12 hidden realistic clue documents, and the Internet. Through a choose-your-own-adventure mechanism, players make decisions that influence the course of the game and lead to solving the case in the end. One by one, they enter different realistically designed locations and encounter the various suspects. Then they choose from 3 different ways to deal with the situation and receive points based on their decisions. Complex puzzles and escape room elements must be solved in order to progress further in the case.

Thematically, the game moves in the environment of the mafia in today's New York. As a member of the mafia you have to uncover the mole in your own ranks who caused the death of the eldest son of the godfather. It's up to you whether you act morally or use other methods to make your victims talk.

The game is closely intertwined with the real world, and players have to keep using traditional apps like Google Maps or Wikipedia to gather information. Writing emails, detiallated web pages and cell phone calls are also part of the immersive gaming experience.

boardgame.name: Frankfurt-Spiel
boardgame.description:
This game may be played in several different ways:

Frankfurt-Spiel (roll and move game with event cards),
Jahresereignisse sammeln (1. with collecting fact cards)
Quartette sammeln (2. with collecting sets of fact cards)
Strategisches Quartette sammeln (like 3., but the 1st to get one set of cards wins)
Frankfurt-Quiz (quiz card game)
Frankfurt-Quartett (card game)
Joker-Quartett (6. with joker cards)
Frankfurt Rommé (card game)


The game was published in 1977 as a promotional boardgame for the "Stadtsparkasse Frankfurt".

—user summary

boardgame.name: Zombie Bus: Le raton laveur
boardgame.description:
Upon arrival, the raccoon immediately loses an item of equipment for each player who owns it (of your choice).

Then at the start of each turn, and as long as it remains in play, he eliminates a random token from the equipment pile.

Note: if both the raccoon and the squirrel are in play, the raccoon immediately joins the squirrel on the active player! It will remain on that player until it is eliminated.

A son arrivée, le raton laveur fait perdre immédiatement un équipement à chaque joueur qui en possède (au choix).

Puis au début de chaque tour, et tant qu'il reste en jeu, il élimine un jeton au hasard de la pile des équipements.

Note : si le raton laveur et l'écureuil sont tous les deux en jeu, le raton laveur rejoint immédiatement l'écureuil sur le joueur actif ! Il restera sur ce joueur jusqu'à son élimination.

boardgame.name: Shadow of the Tomb Raider - The Forge
boardgame.description: Brave the lava-flooded Forge of the fallen gods to uncover the secrets of Kuwaq Yaku. Conquer this all-new challenge tomb, playable solo or in co-op, to obtain the new Grenadier skill, as well as the new Brocken outfit and Umbrage 3-80 weapon. Along the way, Lara must uncover details of a friend’s ancient legacy, and overcome a danger thought to be lost in flames.
boardgame.videogamecompilation: Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition

boardgame.name: Shadow of the Tomb Raider - The Pillar
boardgame.description: Discover the truth behind the legend of the Maya apocalypse! To reclaim an ancient treasure, Lara Croft must defy the treacherous storms of an all-new challenge tomb, all while fighting Trinity. The Pillar offers new customization options, with the Sinchi Chiqa Battle Dress, the Oathtaker’s bow, and the Thousands Eyes skill, which allows Lara to use Survival Instincts when moving through tree canopies or concealment walls.
boardgame.videogamecompilation: Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition

boardgame.name: Shadow of the Tomb Raider - The Nightmare
boardgame.description: Learn the secret Uchu has told no one else! In order to obtain a powerful and mysterious weapon, Lara Croft must face the music in a brand-new challenge tomb, battle foes who look like but are not like any she's ever faced, and confront the deadliest enemy of all: herself. The Nightmare offers new customization options, with the Scales of Q outfit, the Grip of Fear axe, and the White Breath skill, which grants Lara's Fear Arrows the power of an area effect.
boardgame.videogamecompilation: Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition

boardgame.name: Shadow of the Tomb Raider - The Price of Survival
boardgame.description: Solve the mystery of Lara's greatest foe! While trying to crack the private codes of Trinity's leader, Lara must conquer a poisonous new challenge tomb and defeat the elite Paititian soldiers that stand in her way. “The Price of Survival” is an all-new single-player challenge tomb. “The Price Of Survival” offers new customization options, with the Hunter's Array outfit, the Silent Sting pistol, and the Raptor's Eye skill, which enables Lara to tag her enemies for persistent tracking.
boardgame.videogamecompilation: Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition

boardgame.name: Shadow of the Tomb Raider - The Serpent's Heart
boardgame.description: Confront the repercussions of a failed uprising! In order to save the lives of dedicated rebels, Lara Croft must navigate the treacherous waters of a never-before-seen challenge tomb, infiltrate an enemy barracks to stage a prison break, and face cultists in their mountain stronghold. The Serpent's Heart offers new customization options, with the Dragon Scales outfit, the Serpent Lash bow, and the Divine Bounty skill, which rewards Lara with more gold pieces when looting fallen foes.
boardgame.videogamecompilation: Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition

boardgame.name: Shadow of the Tomb Raider - The Grand Caiman
boardgame.description:
A ferocious deity threatens the lives of innocent San Juan villagers in Shadow of the Tomb Raider - The Grand Caiman. In order to protect local villagers from the aggression of Trinity, Lara Croft must hunt mercenaries, face the towering wrath of a volcanic new challenge tomb, and survive the lethal surpise concealed within.

Equip the Force of Chaos Gear pack and unleash primordial hell on your foes! Blast your enemies to pieces with the Whispering Scourge. This suppressed shotgun will let you get the jump on your foes before you blow them away. You'll be able to safely charge into the fray with the Reptile Hide outfit, featuring plates offering resistance against projectiles and memory fabrics that increase experience from assault kills.
boardgame.videogamecompilation: Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition

boardgame.name: Shadow of the Tomb Raider - The Path Home
boardgame.description: The Path Home follows the end of Shadow of the Tomb Raider, with the dust having settled and the battle over. However, when allies go missing, Lara must search ancient tunnels to try and find them. Lara’s new journey features a brand-new challenge tomb, which contains a secret that’s been hidden for ages. The Path Home features new customization options with the Midnight Sentinel outfit, the Silver Strike bow, and the Magic Touch skill, which allows Lara to use fewer resources to craft when on the run.
boardgame.videogamecompilation: Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition

boardgame.name: Sid Meier's Civilization: Beyond Earth – Exoplanets Map Pack
boardgame.description:
The Exoplanets map pack includes six custom maps inspired by real-world exoplanets. Specialized scripts produce randomized geographic layouts each time a new game begins, allowing for even more replayability on new alien worlds.

Maps include:

Kepler 186f: This lush forest planet is one of the oldest known Earth-like planets.
Rigil Khantoris Bb: Orbiting the closest star to the solar system, the historical records of this arid continental planet’s settlement are well-preserved.
Tau Ceti d: This planet of seas and archipelagos features a booming biodiversity and a wealth of resources.
Mu Arae f: Tidally locked in orbit around a weak star, the southern hemisphere of this planet is a blistering desert where the sun never sets, while the northern hemisphere is perpetually in frozen darkness.
82 Eridani e: An alien world of scarce water and wracked by tectonic forces.
Eta Vulpeculae b: A mysterious new discovery with unknown terrain.

boardgame.name: Small World - A Spider's Web
boardgame.description:
This Small World "A Spider's Web" mini expansion contains:
• 3 new Races (Ice Witches, Slingmen and Skags)
• 3 Special Powers (Lava, Copycat and Soul-Touch).
Carve out your place in a world that is too small to accommodate everyone!

boardgame.name: Sonic and All-Stars Racing Transformed - Metal Sonic & Outrun
boardgame.description:
Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed Metal Sonic & Outrun DLC

Download the Metal Sonic & Outrun DLC for Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed. Featuring:
Metal Sonic in his unique transforming vehicle + handling mods
Outrun Bay track, based on the iconic arcade game, + time trials
Exclusive emoticon stickers for your in game license.

boardgame.name: Sonic and All-Stars Racing Transformed - Ryo Hazuki
boardgame.description:
You can now race as Shenmue's Ryo Hazuki alongside other favourite characters in Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed!

• Download now to race as Ryo in his unique transforming vehicle.

boardgame.name: Sonic Adventure 2 - Battle
boardgame.description:
Up the ante in the fight between heroes and villains with Sonic Adventure 2’s Battle Mode DLC!

Upgrade your Sonic Adventure™ 2 experience with six new characters, 21 additional two-player battle maps, and Chao Karate from Sonic Adventure™ 2: Battle!

boardgame.name: Sonic Forces - Episode Shadow
boardgame.description:
Get EPISODE SHADOW to uncover the untold story of the new villain, Infinite, and rediscover three updated stages playing as Shadow. Plus, play as Shadow in over 10 Modern Sonic based stages!

Experience the full story behind the new villain's rise to power and as you find renewed replayablity across Modern Sonic stages. The fate of Sonic the Hedgehog's world is in your hands – Join the Uprising.

boardgame.name: Sonic Forces - Super Sonic
boardgame.description:
Speed through the levels faster than Sonic... as Super Sonic! Get the SUPER SONIC DLC for SONIC FORCES now to transform into Super Sonic across 20+ Modern and Classic Sonic. Collect the right amount of rings and Super Sonic will spring into action, giving you the ability to sprint across stages at break-neck speeds.

Please Note: You cannot participate in the rankings with Super Sonic.

SONIC FORCES is the latest Sonic the Hedgehog game that lets you create a custom character with powerful gadgets, speed through rolling ruined landscapes as Modern Sonic, and catapult past perilous platforms as Classic Sonic.

boardgame.name: Sonic Generations - Casino Night DLC
boardgame.description: Play through the iconic ‘Casino Night’ Pinball stage inspired by ‘Sonic The Hedgehog 2’, and bring your screen to life with an exclusive theme – no Sonic Generations experience is complete without this exclusive content!

boardgame.name: Star Trek: Bridge Crew – The Next Generation
boardgame.description:
The Next Generation DLC enhances your experience of the base game. You need the base game to be able to play the DLC.

Play with your friends cross-platform, either in VR or non-VR.

• A new playable ship: the Enterprise D
It can be used in any of the existing Ongoing Voyages modes, plus the two new modes.

• New Ongoing Voyages mode: Patrol
Fly to your choice of star systems, and then we generate random events and challenges for you to meet along the way.

• New Ongoing Voyages mode: Resistance
A Borg Cube is tracking you, and you must complete a series of objectives to be able to fight back.

• A new player role: Operations
How you assign people at any given moment determines the ship’s capabilities.

• New enemies: the Romulans and the Borg
The Romulans are deadly, making heavy use of surprise attacks. And a single Borg Cube is a nearly unstoppable threat.

A permanent internet connection is required in order to play the game.

boardgame.name: Hallowed Scrolls
boardgame.description: A supplement of rare powers for Mörk Borg.

boardgame.name: Stellaris - Nemesis
boardgame.description:
Nemesis is an expansion to Stellaris in which the player will be able to determine the fate of a destabilizing galaxy. Adding espionage tools, a path to power as the Galactic Custodian to combat endgame crises - or the Menace option to BECOME the endgame crisis - Nemesis gives you the most powerful tools ever available in Stellaris.

Ultimately you will have to make the choice between chaos or control, to take charge of a galaxy spiraling into crisis. Will you find a way to take power through diplomacy or subterfuge, or will you watch the stars go out one by one?
The Nemesis expansion includes:
Become the Crisis: You are the fire that spreads across the galaxy, threatening its very existence. As your empire becomes more and more menacing, you’ll unlock powerful bonuses to finish a hopeless galactic stalemate on your own terms. If the rest of the galaxy can’t stop you in time, you can unleash enough power to end all of existence!

Galactic Custodian: It’s up to you to campaign for the Galactic Community to declare you a Custodian, granting you emergency powers to combat the Crisis. Use them to bring the galaxy back from the edge of destruction and restore order. When the crisis is defeated you may choose to relinquish your powers...or keep them, and form a new Galactic Imperium.

Espionage: Knowledge is power; use new tools to spy on your enemies (or friends). Deploy Envoys to lead covert Operations and counterintelligence behind enemy borders. Lies and deceit will throw your enemies off your scent while you learn their deepest secrets.

As your Infiltration Level grows you’ll unlock new operations, such as Sabotage Starbase, Acquire Assets or Steal Tech. Turn allies against each other through the use of smear campaigns and by instigating diplomatic incidents. Play your cards right, and they’ll be none the wiser: what they don’t know will hurt them.

New Ship Set: Nemesis includes new ships inspired by some of the most imposing empires in science fiction. Whether you’re taking control of the galaxy or wiping it out, you’ll look as powerful as you feel.

boardgame.name: Stellaris - Necroids Species Pack
boardgame.description:
Necroids, an intelligent undead species that live death to the fullest, will allow players to form empires that thrive where others might perish - and perish that others might thrive!
The Necroids Species Pack features a brand new selection of portraits, civics, ship sets and other cosmetics for players who don’t fear the afterlife, and a unique Necrophage origin with new civics.

The Necrophage Origin offers players a powerful primary species which consumes others within its grasp, blurring the line between cult and empire with three unique civics. New cosmetic changes will reincarnate playthroughs of Stellaris for long time players, while also bringing new life to killer empires. The Necroids Species Pack includes:

1 New Origin - Necrophage
Necrophage, now available for Hive Minds
3 New Civics:
○ Death Cult: enables powerful edicts which require the sacrificing of pops
○ Reanimated Armies: allows the deployment of morality-immune, undead armies
○ Memorialists: erect monuments to the galaxy’s past, improving planetary stability and honouring tomb worlds

16 new portraits (15 organic, 1 robotic)
New ship set
New advisor voiceover
New city set & diplomacy room
New Name lists
New building appearances

boardgame.name: Napoleon: Total War – Imperial Eagle Pack
boardgame.description:
This unique collection includes elite units previously only available in the original boxed edition of the game or via pre-order with selected retailers. It also features two brand new units never released before.
These exclusive elite units become available on the campaign map once you have made a specific technological advancement or own the relevant territory.
These elite units will appear in both single and multiplayer game modes.

boardgame.name: Napoleon: Total War – Heroes of the Napoleonic Wars
boardgame.description:
These units were previously available in the Imperial Edition of Napoleon.
These exclusive elite units become available on the campaign map once you have made a specific technological advancement or own the relevant territory.
These elite units will appear in both single and multiplayer game modes.

boardgame.name: SUM8
boardgame.description:
SUM8 is a two player tile based, puzzle-like strategy game with a rearrangeable board, unique tile design and extreme re-playability.

The gameplay is simple: you play against your opponent, each player starting with 8 tiles. In alternating moves you create circles and then eventually '8's in a puzzle like sequence to score points to victory, but don't give your opponent the opportunity to score big!

On their turn, players place a tile onto the board, or move an already placed tile on the board to a new spot. This will give the player points based on what / where they place the tile.

The game ends when all tiles are played, or no one is able to place or move a tile. The player with the highest score wins!

boardgame.name: Pippi Langstrumpf Pantomime
boardgame.description:
This is a charades/pantomime game for 2 groups. Every group gets some cards with nice images of Pippi and her friends and explains the words on the cards to the other group without any words, but just gestures.

The group which recognizes the most cards win.

boardgame.name: Familou
boardgame.description:
During the game, players can discuss with each other what cards they have (but do not show the cards). The object of the game is to lay down cards that help the next player to lay down their hand so that the game is not interrupted. If you can;t, then you must turn over 1 of the wolf cards.

If the players folded six cards from each of the seven families, they won. Conversely, if all six wolf cards are turned over, the wolves win and the players lose the game!

boardgame.name: Pippi packt ihren Koffer
boardgame.description:
This is an interesting memory game for 2-4 children.

All children have a look at the 34 cards and try to memorize them. Then the cards are shuffled and put face down on the table. The youngest child starts and says what s/he wants to put in their bag and turns one card face up. If s/he is lucky, and the card shows the correct image, s/he puts it in their bag. If not, s/he has to turn the card face down again and it's the next player's turn. The child with the most stuff in his bag when the tiles are all picked, wins

boardgame.name: Nachbars Kirschen
boardgame.description:
It's no cinch getting to the delicious cherries in the garden of Mr. Scrooge, the next door neighbour, because 2 dogs are keeping a watchful guard over the cherry tree. Only a child who really knows how to use a fishing line can outwit the guard dogs and hang the pair of cherries he's caught over his ears.

The game is constructed in a box with wooden cherries in pairs attached to strings inside. The is also one pair of dogs attached to strings in the box.

Children take turn using the wooden fishing pole to hook the cherries - avoiding the dogs. The game ends when the cherries run out. The child who hooks the most cherries wins. If a child hooks the dogs, the game stops and they lose.

boardgame.name: Belle prise
Big fish
Dicke Fische
Vette vissen
boardgame.description:
Big fish is a learning game for 2-6 children and requires the ability to observe well and guess the correct range of the fishing net.

Capt'n Catchem, the smart fisherman, is sitting in his small boat and is casting the fishing net again and again. Whoever can help him to move his boat to the right point and catch many fresh fish, will be rewarded with a big catch.

The game is played on the floor or table, the fish are randomly distributed, a minimum distance of 5 cm. In your turn you choose a fish and place the boat where Capt'n Catchem can catch the fish. The fish is caught when it lies in the ring without contact, the boat must not touch or move any fish, the tip should point in the direction of the selected fish, if the boat is set, it is no longer allowed to change its position. When all fish have been caught, the winner is whoever has the longest row when the fish are next to each other.

boardgame.name: Ship Adventure
boardgame.description:
Do you want to explore cities, temples, jungles and islands? Hunt treasures and a lot of gold? Fight pirates and players? Go for an epic conquest of the Caribbean? Then Ship Adventure is made for you! The board of Ship Adventure is made of 36 tiles that allowed an unimaginable number of board combinations to make each playing experience unique.

Ship Adventure is a 2 games in 1 with a treasure hunt mode and a conquest mode.

In Ship Adventure - Treasure Map, players move their ship and crew on the board, choosing the quickest itinerary to reach cities, temples, treasure tokens and pieces of treasure map. Along the journey, they are going to purchase equipment to boost their ship so they perform better score when launch their dice during fights. The game end when a player has gathered the 4 different pieces of treasure map and has reached the coordinates indicated on the puzzle formed by the 4 pieces on the board.

In Ship Adventure - Caribbean Conquest at each turn player move their fleet and armies on the board in order to take the control over strategic points. Each strategic points gives gold coins at the end of the turn which are used to purchase equipment and new units. The game ends when a player controls the majority of the strategic areas or when a player has been eliminated.

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: The Greatest Investor
boardgame.description:
The Greatest Investor is a turn-based strategic card game with the ultimate goal of building the most valuable portfolio. The person with the highest-valued portfolio of assets can claim the title of The Greatest Investor.

The players take turns drawing an asset and an event card, whoever acquires the highest value in assets, best profiting from economic events, becomes The Greatest Investor ever. The game ends when the event deck is depleted

Although the game is easy to learn, that doesn’t necessarily mean becoming The Greatest Investor is simple. With each event card drawn by ANY player, your portfolio of assets may be decimated. So, the longer you play, without going bankrupt, the higher the stakes.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Lese-Polizei: Einsatz in Wimmelstadt
boardgame.description:
Alarm in Wimmelstadt! A gang of thieves is roaming the streets and squares, stealing everything they can get their hands on.
This is a case for the clever reading police! They quickly have a look at the city and follow the clues read to them by the head of police. He tells them where they can find an important witness, a partner in crime, or a crime scene. With these clues they can find the perpetrators and the loot.

Listen carefully and look closely, and you can find the clues you're looking for, with a bit of luck, you can catch all the bags from the robbery boss and stop to the thieves. But beware: if the boss of the thieves has most of the loot in his hiding place, the thieves have won.

This game playfully promotes reading and listening skills
of children in preschool and first reading age. Since the game also requires close observation, it also improves the ability to concentrate.

boardgame.name: Mäuse-ABC
boardgame.description:
This game consists of 6 small games for children to start learning letters and reading.

Game 1 - Insert letters:
The children insert letter tiles in the correct alphabetical order in the frame. This can be controlled with the ABC board. For correct letters, the kid gets a mouse cards and the one with the most mouse cards wins at the end of the game.

Game 2 - Arrange letters
The letter tiles are put face down in the frame above the ABC board according to color. The starting kid roles the dice and one letter card of the corresponding colour is revealed which s/he needs to put in the correct place.

Game 3- Guessing letters
The letters are put unordered in the cheese frame, underneath is a template sheet (inserted by a child as the game leader). Whoever thinks they can guess the letter quickly puts their mouse on it.

Game 4 - Search for a word
The letters are placed face down in the frame. The game master selects a word from the word list and the children try to find the letters of this word.

Game 5 - Reveal a word
The letters of a word from the list are to be found and uncovered in one go, everyone has to remember all the uncovered letters and their places.

Game 6 - Find a word
Words are to be formed from the revealed letters. The children can use the word list to help them.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Wer zuletzt lacht...
boardgame.description:
In this card game, every player gets five cards. During his turn, each player put one card face up in front of him. For every smiling face, he gets a chip and puts it on his card. For every sad face, he can take a chip from another player.
The player with most chips wins.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Sagrada: Promo 16 – CuseCon 2021 Window Pattern Card
boardgame.description: A new promotional, double-sided window pattern card distributed at CuseCon in 2021.

boardgame.name: Castle of Mind for Kids
boardgame.description:
Castle of Mind for Kids is the little sister of the Castle of Mind board game, designed to be played with kids from preschool and challenge even older ones. It's an exciting two-person strategy board game in which players are the first to try to get their lion to the cliff in the middle of the board by controlling various animal discs. Its rules are easy to learn, the gameplay is fast, the playing time is approx. 5-15 minutes. Perfect for an introductory strategy board game.

The game board indicates where in the starting position the two players can place the discs for each animal. Once each animal disk is in place, the starting player moves one of their animal disks to a neighboring space. Players cannot move diagonally with their animal discs. Any animal can enter any field, but only a lion can enter the middle red field. Players take turns moving their discs, and if the animal moves to a square of the same color (corresponding to its habitat), it can chase an opponent's animal that is on a square of the same color.

There are several ways to win: players get their lion to the cliff, or chase the opponent’s lion. Or, if our opponent can’t take a valid move, we win.

Players need to be very forward-thinking and attentive, keeping an eye on the entire board to protect our animals while moving with them and our lion. It is an enjoyable logic-strategy board game that can be taken out again and again, which perfectly develops logical thinking, the ability to plan ahead, the ability to combine, the concentration of attention and social skills.

boardgame.name: Stormsunder: Bones of the Conquered
boardgame.description:
Continue the Stormsunder: Heirs of Ruin core game adventure with the Bones of the Conquered expansion with hundreds of hours of new gameplay!

This expansion contains more than 136 minatures, 1300 cards and a 300-page campain book!
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Stormsunder: Heirs of Ruin 3D Terrain Pack

boardgame.name: Stormsunder: A Pharaoh's Wrath
boardgame.description:
Continue the Stormsunder: Heirs of Ruin core game and Bones of the Conquered expansion adventure with the A Pharaoh's Wrath expansion with hundreds of hours of new gameplay!

This expansion contains more than 110 minatures, 1500 cards and a 300-page campain book!
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Stormsunder: Heirs of Ruin 3D Terrain Pack

boardgame.name: Stormsunder: The Faceless Expansion
boardgame.description:
The Faceless expansion adds the Faceless as an additional faction to Stormsunder as a way for players to increase the difficulty of their adventure. Early on in the story, the heroes will cross paths with the Faceless and be hunted by them throughout their journey. The Faceless may arrive one or two at a time during an encounter to harass the heroes, or they may attack in full force after the heroes are already weary from combat. Regardless, the Faceless present a unique challenge for players to choose to embark upon. If you want a challenge, this is the way to go.

The Faceless Expansion includes:
- 13 Faceless Miniatures (Bakeal x1, Faceless Negator x3, Faceless Abolisher x3, Faceless Obliterator x3, Faceless Nullifier x3).
- 103 Adversary, Equipment and Other Cards.
- 48-Page Campaign Book.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Stormsunder: Wayward Squire Expansion
boardgame.description:
The Wayward Squire expansion adds Lady Aylwen, Phelt and Frank to the world of Stormsunder. Hailing from the Tulion Wastes from a far away land, the valiant knight, her lazy squire and his adorable decoy are traveling from world to world, desperately trying to get home. Lady Aylwen and Phelt are new Wayward heroes with their own story arc that can be added to your Stormsunder campaign. Frank doesn’t have his own story to tell, but is made with a small amount of explosives, so feel free to stand between him and some vampires.

The Wayward Squire Expansion Includes:
- 3 Miniatures (Lady Aylwen x1, Phelt x1 and Frank x1.
- 198 Hero, Skill and Other Cards.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Suffrage
boardgame.description:
Become a leader of the women’s suffrage movement demanding votes for women! Be inspired by history or choose a different path as you conduct actions, grow the movement of supporters and ultimately win the vote!

Suffrage is a card based board game about the iconic and pivotal struggle for women’s suffrage in early 20th century Britain and Ireland. Each player takes the role of one of six historical women, all interesting and important personalities in the movement. The goal of the game is to acquire a large enough movement and persuade enough male MP’s over at Parliament to support the cause of votes for women. The game consists of 110 cards and 60 custom suffrage supporter miniatures.

On each turn, players choose 1 of the available action cards. Depending on what kind of action is chosen, some supporters will join the movement, while others will leave. Suffragettes for example will gladly join the cause, planting bombs and conducting sabotage, while Suffragists instead support peaceful actions, slow and steady. Similairly, the upper class women and the working class women support - and reject - different actions. It is up to the player to choose which path is most efficient, based on the available action cards.

Once a large enough movement is gathered, the player goes to the Parliament, where - based on the size of the movement - a certain number of MP's (Members of Parliament) will either vote YES or NO to the demand of women's right to vote. A player wins the game by getting at least 10 YES votes.

boardgame.name: Stormsunder: Villains and Civilians I
boardgame.description:
The Villains & Civilians I expansion takes the cardboard tokens and replacement miniatures used in Heirs of Ruin for some adversaries, civilians and other objective characters and replaces them with unique miniatures.

Villains & Civilians I includes:
26 Miniatures (Lady Nadja x1, Lady Draga x1, Lord Matic x1, Lady Vesna x1, Laz'lek x1, Myrmidite Champion x1, Emilija x1, General Jatif x1, Taumet x1, Desert Lioness x1, Guard Captain Belar x1, Florian Roth x1, Ja'ja the Ravenous x1, Unsated Alpha x1, Tarpitt Civilian (Male) x3, Tarpitt Civilian (Female) x3, Human Thrall (Male) x3, Human Thrall (Female) x3.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Stormsunder: Villains and Civilians II
boardgame.description:
The Villains & Civilians II expansion takes the cardboard tokens and replacement miniatures used in Bones of the Conquered for some adversaries, civilians and other objective characters and replaces them with unique miniatures.

Villains & Civilians II includes:
26 Miniatures (Fie'gal the Inevitable x1, Wrapth'dar the Collector x1, Zoriah the Bloody x1, General Kojima x1, High Priest of the Ruined Horn x1, Carnivorous x1, Retann Quartermaster x1, Retann Warden x1, Xeleron x1, General Zoran Kos x1, Minotaur Chieftain x1, Kantarak Damned x3, Kantarak Civilian (Male) x3, Kantarak Civilian (Female) x3, Depraved Prisoner (Male) x3, Depraved Prisoner (Female) x3).

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Stormsunder: Villains and Civilians III
boardgame.description:
The Villains & Civilians III expansion takes the cardboard tokens and replacement miniatures used in A Pharaoh's Wrath for some adversaries, civilians and other objective characters and replaces them with unique miniatures.

Villains & Civilians III includes:
26 Miniatures (Rebecca Coste x1, Grit Morta x1, Yaku Atoc x1, Irynnath High Priestess x1, Altekhan Juggernaut x1, Zakarhet x1, Desert Hydra x1, Myrmidite Gladiator x1, Sandswimmer x1, Witchblood Abomination x1, Nnamdi the Hewer x1, Sandskimmer Deckhand Civilian x3, Mahuizoh's Army Civilian x4, Irynnath Civilian (Male) x4, Irynnath Civilian (Female) x4).

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Stormsunder: Heirs of Ruin 3D Terrain Pack
boardgame.description:
Replace all the Heirs of Ruin punchboard terrain tokens (except holes) with this 63-miniature terrain pack! Each terrain miniature is gorgeously sculpted, increasing the immersion of Stormsunder's already epic encounters.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Stormsunder: Elise, the Lost Princess
boardgame.description:
Adds Elise, a quest giver and epic summon for use during the Stormsunder campaign.

Elise, the Lost Princess of Tarpitt includes
- Elise Miniature x1.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Stormsunder: Faeyra, the Last Titan
boardgame.description:
Faeyra, the Last Titan is a massive 120 mm tall "miniature" that serves as a quest giver and boss in the game.

Faeyra, the Last Titan expansion includes:
- 1 Miniature: Faeyra x1.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Stormsunder: Dice Pack
boardgame.description:
More Stormsunder dice to spread around the table. Includes 20 dice: 2 Fate, 6 Physical (Green), 6 Magical (Blue) and 6 Impact (Red).

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Stormsunder: Stretch Goal Box
boardgame.description:
The Stretch Goal Box will hold all Stretch Goals reached during the crowdfunding of Stormsunder.

The following SGs were unlocked during the campaign:
Davor, Aide to the Council
Feilheim, the Hinterlord
Liora, the Gatekeeper
Lord Gregor
Lorelei Blackburn, Captain of the Starfire
Map of Tarpit
Quell, Hero of Tarpitt
Rask, the Half-Giant Hermit
Steelweb Spider
The design-a-hero Hero
The Old Kingdom Map
Vacrem, the Chosen
2x Chameleon, Friend of the Desert
3x Council Enchantresses
2x Desert Dog, Companion of Life
2x Earth Spirit, Tiny Stone Giants
2x Fire Spirit, Enemies of the Storm
2x Gryphon, Defenders of Irynnath
2x Hawk, Companion of Nyere
2x Ice Golem, Enemy of the Desert
3x Retann Fireslingers
2x Runecannons
2x Runetech Golems
2x The Wrathful
Drustan (The Rangers Crossover)
Horned Golem (Wild Assent Crossover)
The Scavanger (Posthuman Saga Crossover)
The Ursus (Oathsworn Crossover)
26x Ability Card
6x Consumable Card
10x Epic Equipment
5x Rare Equipment
13x Signature Skill
3x Origin Quest
4x Additional Side Quest
1x Crafting Adventure
1x Crafting Quest
2x Creature Hunt
1x Exploration Side Quest
2x Epic Exploration Side Quest
2x Epic Side Quest

boardgame.name: Chronicles of Drunagor: Build your own Dungeon
boardgame.description:
You will get 1 copy of Build Your Own Dungeon, that includes: 10x Map Tiles, 2x Dungeon Tray 1, 2x Dungeon Tray 2, 1x Dungeon Tray 3.


Not a stand-alone game, you need Chronicles of Drunagor - Age of Darkness core box to use this expansion.


—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Chronicles of Drunagor: Age of Darkness

boardgame.name: Chronicles of Drunagor: Apocalypse Dice Set
boardgame.description:
You get 1 copy of the Apocalypse Dice Set, which includes 5x D20 (one of each type) in a premium tin box with a foam interior to keep your dice safe!

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Chronicles of Drunagor: Age of Darkness
Chronicles of Drunagor: Age of Darkness Apocalypse

boardgame.name: Chronicles of Drunagor: Metal Initiative Marker
boardgame.description:
You will get a 1x Metal Initiative Marker.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Chronicles of Drunagor: Age of Darkness
Chronicles of Drunagor: Age of Darkness Apocalypse

boardgame.name: Chronicles of Drunagor: Dual Layer Monster Status Boards
boardgame.description:
You will get: 2 Dual Layer Monster Status Board

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Chronicles of Drunagor: Age of Darkness
Chronicles of Drunagor: Age of Darkness Apocalypse

boardgame.name: Lost to a Yellow Stone
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

The Players are tasked with the retrieval of a potent and rare yellow gem, which is used in high-level Alchemy. It was stolen from the local Arcane Academy weeks ago, and the players have tracked the movements of the thieves to a system of caves below tall, rocky, mountains.

These caves, however, are home to a particular species of Drowshrooms that fill the air with spores that make whoever breathes them drowsy and lethargic. This is the perfect environment to thrive for some flesh-eating snails, too slow to chase their prey in the open. These Drowsnails adapted to the spore-filled air and even attach small Drowshrooms to their shells.

boardgame.name: Auksinis protas: BLITZ
boardgame.description:
"Golden mind. BLITZ is a fast and fun board game based on the Golden Mind TV game show. An intelligent board game will make you feel not only a participant in a popular TV show, but also its host.

Players ask each other questions from 108 question cards with five question categories in each: multiple choice questions, a chain, an open question, and a yes or no quiz. The goal is to collect as many rubies as possible than your opponents and become not only the smartest but also the richest winner.


„Auksinis protas. BLITZ“ – greitas ir linksmas stalo žaidimas, sukurtas pagal TV žaidimą „Auksinis protas“. Intelektualus stalo žaidimas leis jums pasijusti ne tik populiariosios TV laidos dalyviais, bet kartu – ir jos vedėjais.

Žaidėjai vieni kitiems uždavineja klausimus iš 108 klausimų kortelių, kuriose yra net po penkias klausimų kategorijas: klausimai su atsakymo variantais, grandinėlė, atviras klausimas bei taip ar ne viktorina. Tikslas - kuo greičiau už varžovus surinkti kuo daugiau rubinų ir tapti ne tik protingiausiais, bet ir turtingiausiais nugalėtojais.

boardgame.name: Freakz in the Sheetz: Vol. 1 Starter Pack
boardgame.description:
How would you react if you woke up with a Sheetz tattoo? What if you made an M*T*O Burger so big you couldn’t fit it in your mouth? Find out in this hilarious adult (13+) party game! Compete with your friends to see who will be crowned Freak of the Memez by matching Pic Cardz with Caption Cardz, and creating your own Sheetzy meme combos.

Uses What Do You Meme? game mechanics. Each round, one player takes the role of judge and plays a photo card, after which everyone else plays a caption card to complete the meme. The judge decides the funniest pairing, and whoever played the winning caption card wins the round.

boardgame.name: That Time You Killed Me: Consumption promo pack
boardgame.description:
A promo envelope full of secrets for That Time You Killed Me.
Directions on when to open the envelope and what to do with the contents will be revealed to players when they reach the Coda of the campaign.

The envelope contains 5 cards - 1 flavor text card (P.1) and 4 Temporal Powers (P.2, P.3, P.4 and P.5)

boardgame.name: Dead Machine Gods
boardgame.description:
Dead Machine Gods is a strategic cyber-occult worker placement and tableau building mint tin game for 1-2 players. Set in a world of dark magic, occult technology, and haunted machinery.

Gather resources, research and build arcane blueprints, and complete the rites of summoning to resurrect ancient mecha-deities. Will you appease the ancient ones or succumb to their grim will and embrace the call of annihilation?

In each round of Dead Machine Gods, players will roll all their worker dice, and take turns placing workers on available card slots based-on their rolls. Placing workers lets you gather energy, material, and blueprints for building out your tableau.

The game ends when the first player completes their 8-card tableau (completing the rites of summoning). Players then tally the base victory points on the cards in their tableau as well any additional points earned form card abilities, placement synergies, and special symbols. The player with the highest score, wins.

boardgame.name: Dribble
boardgame.description:
Can You Master The Dribble? Patience and dexterity are needed to conquer this unique challenge. The further you get the ball from one end of the twisting pegs to the other without the ball falling through, the higher your score. Use the larger glass ball or the smaller, more difficult metal ball.

This dexterity game consists of a long wooden board with 4 squares marked out with point values.

Attached to the board are two parallel wooden rods, slightly above the scoring squares. The rods have smaller offset spokes attached in a spiral that move the ball along as the rods turn.

Players must attempt to join the spokes on both rods making the ball roll "uphill" before it drops into a scoring square. The player with the most points wins.

boardgame.name: Kereszt és Félhold
boardgame.description:
Kereszt és Félhold (Cross & Crescent) is an abstract-style battle game for 2 or 4 players. It was designed to reenact battles between the Ottoman army and the allied Christian forces in the 16th and 17th centuries. Gameplay is entirely based on strategy, with zero luck factor. In the case of 4 players, the game becomes semi-cooperative; two commanders are in charge of the same army forces, but the winner will be the one with the higher score on the winning side.

Each round consists of two phases. In the first phase, players prepare for their planned operations behind the screens. The second phase is the combat itself, when the pre-defined commands are executed. The game ends when 50 victory points are achieved by any of the parties.

Both armies are controlled by means of troop cards, which govern the operations of the “troop towers” representing the specific army corps on the board. Troop cards are double-sided: turning them over, players can develop troop capabilities and unlock more advanced features. The available options for movement and combat are determined by troop capabilities and terrain conditions. Certain terrain structures (such as bridges and tranches) can be built during the battle.

The rulebook includes 4 real battle scenarios, but the modular board allows players to set up a custom play area, giving the game unlimited replay potential.


A Kereszt és Félhold 2 vagy 4 fős absztrakt harci játék, mely az európai szövetséges seregek és az oszmán hadak közötti, XVI-XVII. századi csaták újrajátszásához ad kereteket. A játék teljesen szerencsementes. Négy játékos esetén 2-2 kapitány irányítja ugyanazt a sereget, azonban együttműködésük félkooperatív: játék végén a győztes sereg nagyobb pontszámmal rendelkező kapitánya nyeri meg a játékot.Minden forduló két fázisból áll: az első fázisban a hadműveletek előkészítése zajlik a paraván takarásában, a második fázisban pedig a parancsok teljesítése, azaz maga az összecsapás. A játék addig tart, amíg valamelyik fél el nem éri az 50 pontot.

A táblán a lépés- és támadáslehetőségeket az egyes hadtestek képességei, illetve a terep egyszerre befolyásolják; bizonyos terepelemek (pl. híd vagy sánc) a harc közben is építhetők.

A szabályban 4 korabeli összecsapás szerepel, de a moduláris tábla lehetőséget biztosít egyéni játéktér kialakítására is, így szinte végtelen újrajátszhatóságot kínál.

boardgame.name: Vault of Magic
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Inside Vault of Magic, you’ll find a vast treasure trove of enchanted items of every imaginable use—more than 950 in all! The heaps of armors, weapons, potions, rings, and wands are just for starters. From mirrors to masks, edibles to earrings, and lanterns to lockets, it’s all here, ready for your 5th Edition game.


More than 25 unique items designed by special guests, including Luke Gygax, Patrick Rothfuss, Gail Simone, and Deborah Ann Woll
Fabled items that grow in power as characters rise in levels
New item themes, such as monster-inspired, clockwork, and apprentice wizards
Item sets that power up if worn together
Hundreds of full-color illustrations
Complete treasure-generation tables sorted by rarity


Amaze and delight your players and spice up your 5th Edition
campaign with fresh, new enchanted items from Vault of Magic.
It’ll turn that next treasure hoard into something . . . wondrous!

boardgame.name: Enoch's Wake: A Game of the Infinite Void
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Enoch’s Wake: A Game of the Infinite Void is a tabletop roleplaying game in which you, the players, take the roles of crew—residents of Enoch looking for jobs to make their fortunes and protect their loved ones. These residents range from those who have had long careers to those who have just turned 18 and are eager to form a crew. The jobs might involve heists, vendettas, sabotage, and smuggling.
boardgame.rpg: Enoch's Wake: A Game of the Infinite Void

boardgame.name: The Jitters
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Act I: The Jitters (Levels 1 through 4) Under typical circumstances, the murder of four people makes little stir in the city of Tiarazan. In this case, however, the deaths threaten the city’s political and social status quo and represent a much deeper threat long-term. The characters investigate the reasons and circumstances as to the targeting of the eldest son of the noble family of Kommein and the eldest daughter of the merchant family Tzekes. As the PCs explore the clues, they stumble upon a mob driven by collective madness, and shortly thereafter receive a cryptic warning from an unknown source (perhaps a future ally or benefactor). The fact that someone disapproves of their investigation becomes all too apparent when a group of assassins, led by a bard whom they recently heard play, attempts to kill them. After the attack, the characters learn the bard belonged to The Mummers, a cult of musicians, poets, and artists devoted to a mesmerizing leader, Molleus the Eye. This cult was involved in the murders that sparked the investigation. The PCs investigate the original crime scene, collect evidence, and find an eyewitness account, all of which point to an occult or supernatural ritual. They encounter an ambush from more of Molleus’s followers, prompting them to confront the cult. At the end of the act, however, the PCs realize the original murders represent merely the opening gambit of a larger scheme threatening the city.

boardgame.name: Stage Rehearsal
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Act II opens with the PCs recovering from their recent fight against Molleus and the Mummers. The evidence accumulated thus far suggests Molleus played a role in the four murders that started everything. Although Molleus and some of his minions escaped, they suffered a defeat and a setback. They need time to regroup.

boardgame.name: Oratorio
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Act III begins in the wake of a victory against Molleus and the Mummers. The PCs stopped the performance of The King in Yellow and delivered a punishing blow to the cultists, but the escaped Ishvani Tzekes continues to pursue her scheme to remake the City of Tiarazan. Even worse, the cultists completed enough of their ritual such that the moon now displays the Yellow Sign for all to see in the night sky. Madness and chaos in the city threaten to reach a fever pitch as more and more people fall victim to the King in Yellow’s influence.

boardgame.name: Encore
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Act IV opens approximately one year after the characters left Tiarazan and saved it from chaos and madness. The PCs have pursued other adventures, undertaken quests elsewhere, and generally put the incident with Ishvani Tzekes and the King in Yellow behind them. A few scars — both physical and spiritual — remain from their battle, but the characters have continued their careers.
